 154     private File getBackgroundFile(){                                                                    
 155         return new File(getContext().getExternalFilesDir(null), "hr_background.bin");                    
 156     }                                                                                                    
 157                                                                                                          
 158     private void loadBackground(){                                                                       
 159         try {                                                                                            
 160             FileInputStream fis = new FileInputStream(getBackgroundFile());                              
 161             int count = fis.available();                                                                 
 162             if(count != 14400){                                                                          
 163                 throw new RuntimeException("wrong background file length");                              
 164             }                                                                                            
 165             byte[] file = new byte[14400];                                                               
 166             fis.read(file);                                                                              
 167             fis.close();                                                                                 
 168             this.backGroundImage = AssetImageFactory.createAssetImage(file, 0, 0, 0);                    
 169         } catch (FileNotFoundException e) {                                                              
 170             SharedPreferences preferences = getDeviceSpecificPreferences();                              
 171             if (preferences.getBoolean("force_white_color_scheme", false)) {                             
 172                 Bitmap whiteBitmap = Bitmap.createBitmap(239, 239, Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888);             
 173                 new Canvas(whiteBitmap).drawColor(Color.WHITE);                                          
 174                                                                                                          
 175                 try {                                                                                    
 176                     this.backGroundImage = AssetImageFactory.createAssetImage(whiteBitmap, true, 0, 1, 0)🔵
 177                     queueWrite(new AssetFilePutRequest(this.backGroundImage, (byte) 0x00, this));        
 178                 } catch (IOException e2) {                                                               
 179                     logger.error("Backgroundimage error", e2);                                           
 180                 }                                                                                        
 181             }                                                                                            
 182         } catch (IOException | RuntimeException e) {                                                     
 183             GB.log("error opening background file", GB.ERROR, e);                                        
 184             GB.toast("error opening background file", Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.ERROR);                      
 185         }                                                                                                
 186     }                                                                                                    
 187                                                                                                          
 188     @Override                                                                                            
 189     public void setBackgroundImage(byte[] pixels) {                                                      
 190         if(pixels == null){                                                                              
 191             getBackgroundFile().delete();                                                                
 192             this.backGroundImage = null;                                                                 
 193         }else{                                                                                           
 194             this.backGroundImage = AssetImageFactory.createAssetImage(pixels, 0, 0, 0);                  
 195             try {                                                                                        
 196                 FileOutputStream fos = new FileOutputStream(getBackgroundFile(), false);                 
 197                 fos.write(pixels);                                                                       
 198             } catch (IOException e) {                                                                    
 199                 GB.log("error saving background", GB.ERROR, e);                                          
 200                 GB.toast("error persistent saving background", Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.ERROR);             
 201             }                                                                                            
 202         }                                                                                                
 203         renderWidgets();                                                                                 
 204     }

 280     private void uploadWidgets(){                                                                        
 281         negotiateSymmetricKey();                                                                         
 282         ArrayList<Widget> systemWidgets = new ArrayList<>(widgets.size());                               
 283         for(Widget widget : this.widgets){                                                               
 284             if(!(widget instanceof CustomWidget)) systemWidgets.add(widget);                             
 285         }                                                                                                
 286         queueWrite(new WidgetsPutRequest(systemWidgets.toArray(new Widget[0]), this));                   
 287     }

 440     @Override                                                                                            
 441     public void setWidgetContent(String widgetID, String content, boolean renderOnWatch) {               
 442         boolean update = false;                                                                          
 443         for (Widget widget : this.widgets) {                                                             
 444             if(!(widget instanceof CustomWidget)) continue;                                              
 445             if(((CustomWidget) widget).updateElementValue(widgetID, content)) update = true;             
 446         }                                                                                                
 447                                                                                                          
 448         if (renderOnWatch && update) renderWidgets();                                                    
 449     }

 451     private void negotiateSymmetricKey() {                                                               
 452         queueWrite(new VerifyPrivateKeyRequest(                                                          
 453                 this.getSecretKey(),                                                                     
 454                 this                                                                                     
 455         ));                                                                                              
 456     }

 458     @Override                                                                                            
 459     public void setTime() {                                                                              
 460         negotiateSymmetricKey();                                                                         
 461                                                                                                          
 462         long millis = System.currentTimeMillis();                                                        
 463         TimeZone zone = new GregorianCalendar().getTimeZone();                                           
 464                                                                                                          
 465         queueWrite(                                                                                      
 466                 new ConfigurationPutRequest(                                                             
 467                         new TimeConfigItem(                                                              
 468                                 (int) (millis / 1000 + getDeviceSupport().getTimeOffset() * 60),         
 469                                 (short) (millis % 1000),                                                 
 470                                 (short) (zone.getOffset(millis) / 60000)                                 
 471                         ),                                                                               
 472                         this), false                                                                     
 473         );                                                                                               
 474     }

 476     @Override                                                                                            
 477     public void setMusicInfo(MusicSpec musicSpec) {                                                      
 478         if (                                                                                             
 479                 currentSpec != null                                                                      
 480                         && currentSpec.album.equals(musicSpec.album)                                     
 481                         && currentSpec.artist.equals(musicSpec.artist)                                   
 482                         && currentSpec.track.equals(musicSpec.track)                                     
 483         ) return;                                                                                        
 484         currentSpec = musicSpec;                                                                         
 485         try {                                                                                            
 486             queueWrite(new MusicInfoSetRequest(                                                          
 487                     musicSpec.artist,                                                                    
 488                     musicSpec.album,                                                                     
 489                     musicSpec.track,                                                                     
 490                     this                                                                                 
 491             ));                                                                                          
 492         }catch (BufferOverflowException e){                                                              
 493             GB.log("musicInfo: " + musicSpec, GB.ERROR, e);                                              
 494         }                                                                                                
 495     }

 528     public boolean playRawNotification(NotificationSpec notificationSpec) {                              
 529         String senderOrTitle = StringUtils.getFirstOf(notificationSpec.sender, notificationSpec.title);  
 530                                                                                                          
 531         try {                                                                                            
 532             for (NotificationHRConfiguration configuration : this.notificationConfigurations){           
 533                 if(configuration.getPackageName().equals(notificationSpec.sourceAppId)){                 
 534                     queueWrite(new PlayTextNotificationRequest(notificationSpec.sourceAppId, senderOrTitl🔵
 535                     return true;                                                                         
 536                 }                                                                                        
 537             }                                                                                            
 538             queueWrite(new PlayTextNotificationRequest("generic", senderOrTitle, notificationSpec.body, t🔵
 539         }catch (Exception e){                                                                            
 540             e.printStackTrace();                                                                         
 541         }                                                                                                
 542         return true;                                                                                     
 543     }

 570     // this method is based on the one from AppMessageHandlerYWeather.java                               
 571     private int getIconForConditionCode(int conditionCode, boolean isNight) {                            
 572         final int CLEAR_DAY = 0;                                                                         
 573         final int CLEAR_NIGHT = 1;                                                                       
 574         final int CLOUDY = 2;                                                                            
 575         final int PARTLY_CLOUDY_DAY = 3;                                                                 
 576         final int PARTLY_CLOUDY_NIGHT = 4;                                                               
 577         final int RAIN = 5;                                                                              
 578         final int SNOW = 6;                                                                              
 579         final int SNOW_2 = 7; // same as 6?                                                              
 580         final int THUNDERSTORM = 8;                                                                      
 581         final int CLOUDY_2 = 9; // same as 2?                                                            
 582         final int WINDY = 10;                                                                            
 583                                                                                                          
 584         if (conditionCode == 800 || conditionCode == 951) {                                              
 585             return isNight ? CLEAR_NIGHT : CLEAR_DAY;                                                    
 586         } else if (conditionCode > 800 && conditionCode < 900) {                                         
 587             return isNight ? PARTLY_CLOUDY_NIGHT : PARTLY_CLOUDY_DAY;                                    
 588         } else if (conditionCode >= 300 && conditionCode < 400) {                                        
 589             return RAIN; // drizzle mapped to rain                                                       
 590         } else if (conditionCode >= 500 && conditionCode < 600) {                                        
 591             return RAIN;                                                                                 
 592         } else if (conditionCode >= 700 && conditionCode < 732) {                                        
 593             return CLOUDY;                                                                               
 594         } else if (conditionCode == 741 || conditionCode == 751 || conditionCode == 761 || conditionCode 🔵
 595             return CLOUDY; // fog mapped to cloudy                                                       
 596         } else if (conditionCode == 771) {                                                               
 597             return CLOUDY; // squalls mapped to cloudy                                                   
 598         } else if (conditionCode == 781) {                                                               
 599             return WINDY; // tornato mapped to windy                                                     
 600         } else if (conditionCode >= 200 && conditionCode < 300) {                                        
 601             return THUNDERSTORM;                                                                         
 602         } else if (conditionCode >= 600 && conditionCode <= 602) {                                       
 603             return SNOW;                                                                                 
 604         } else if (conditionCode >= 611 && conditionCode <= 622) {                                       
 605             return RAIN;                                                                                 
 606         } else if (conditionCode == 906) {                                                               
 607             return RAIN; // hail mapped to rain                                                          
 608         } else if (conditionCode >= 907 && conditionCode < 957) {                                        
 609             return WINDY;                                                                                
 610         } else if (conditionCode == 905) {                                                               
 611             return WINDY;                                                                                
 612         } else if (conditionCode == 900) {                                                               
 613             return WINDY;                                                                                
 614         } else if (conditionCode == 901 || conditionCode == 902 || conditionCode == 962) {               
 615             return WINDY;                                                                                
 616         }                                                                                                
 617         return isNight ? CLEAR_NIGHT : CLEAR_DAY;                                                        
 618     }                                                                                                    
 619                                                                                                          
 620     @Override                                                                                            
 621     public void onSendWeather(WeatherSpec weatherSpec) {                                                 
 622         long ts = System.currentTimeMillis();                                                            
 623         ts /= 1000;                                                                                      
 624         try {                                                                                            
 625             JSONObject responseObject = new JSONObject()                                                 
 626                     .put("res", new JSONObject()                                                         
 627                             .put("id", 0) // seems the id does not matter?                               
 628                             .put("set", new JSONObject()                                                 
 629                                     .put("weatherInfo", new JSONObject()                                 
 630                                             .put("alive", ts + 60 * 60)                                  
 631                                             .put("unit", "c") // FIXME: do not hardcode                  
 632                                             .put("temp", weatherSpec.currentTemp - 273)                  
 633                                             .put("cond_id", getIconForConditionCode(weatherSpec.currentCo🔵
 634                                     )                                                                    
 635                             )                                                                            
 636                     );                                                                                   
 637                                                                                                          
 638             queueWrite(new JsonPutRequest(responseObject, this));                                        
 639                                                                                                          
 640             JSONArray forecastWeekArray = new JSONArray();                                               
 641             final String[] weekdays = {"", "Sun", "Mon", "Tue", "Wed", "Thu", "Fri", "Sat"};             
 642             Calendar cal = Calendar.getInstance();                                                       
 643             cal.setTimeInMillis(weatherSpec.timestamp * 1000L);                                          
 644             int i = 0;                                                                                   
 645             for (WeatherSpec.Forecast forecast : weatherSpec.forecasts) {                                
 646                 cal.add(Calendar.DATE, 1);                                                               
 647                 int dayOfWeek = cal.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_WEEK);                                           
 648                 forecastWeekArray.put(new JSONObject()                                                   
 649                         .put("day", weekdays[dayOfWeek])                                                 
 650                         .put("cond_id", getIconForConditionCode(forecast.conditionCode, false)) // FIXME 🔵
 651                         .put("high", forecast.maxTemp - 273)                                             
 652                         .put("low", forecast.minTemp - 273)                                              
 653                 );                                                                                       
 654                 if (++i == 3) break; // max 3                                                            
 655             }                                                                                            
 656                                                                                                          
 657             JSONArray forecastDayArray = new JSONArray();                                                
 658             final int[] hours = {0, 0, 0};                                                               
 659                                                                                                          
 660             for (int hour : hours) {                                                                     
 661                 forecastDayArray.put(new JSONObject()                                                    
 662                         .put("hour", hour)                                                               
 663                         .put("cond_id", 0)                                                               
 664                         .put("temp", 0)                                                                  
 665                 );                                                                                       
 666             }                                                                                            
 667                                                                                                          
 668                                                                                                          
 669             JSONObject forecastResponseObject = new JSONObject()                                         
 670                     .put("res", new JSONObject()                                                         
 671                             .put("id", 0)                                                                
 672                             .put("set", new JSONObject()                                                 
 673                                     .put("weatherApp._.config.locations", new JSONArray()                
 674                                             .put(new JSONObject()                                        
 675                                                     .put("alive", ts + 60 * 60)                          
 676                                                     .put("city", weatherSpec.location)                   
 677                                                     .put("unit", "c") // FIXME: do not hardcode          
 678                                                     .put("temp", weatherSpec.currentTemp - 273)          
 679                                                     .put("high", weatherSpec.todayMaxTemp - 273)         
 680                                                     .put("low", weatherSpec.todayMinTemp - 273)          
 681                                                     .put("rain", 0)                                      
 682                                                     .put("cond_id", getIconForConditionCode(weatherSpec.c🔵
 683                                                     .put("forecast_day", forecastDayArray)               
 684                                                     .put("forecast_week", forecastWeekArray)             
 685                                             )                                                            
 686                                     )                                                                    
 687                             )                                                                            
 688                     );                                                                                   
 689                                                                                                          
 690             queueWrite(new JsonPutRequest(forecastResponseObject, this));                                
 691                                                                                                          
 692         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 693             logger.error("JSON exception: ", e);                                                         
 694         }                                                                                                
 695     }

 726     public byte[] getSecretKey() {                                                                       
 727         byte[] authKeyBytes = new byte[16];                                                              
 728                                                                                                          
 729         SharedPreferences sharedPrefs = GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(getDeviceSupport().get🔵
 730                                                                                                          
 731         String authKey = sharedPrefs.getString("authkey", null);                                         
 732         if (authKey != null && !authKey.isEmpty()) {                                                     
 733             byte[] srcBytes = authKey.trim().getBytes();                                                 
 734             if (authKey.length() == 34 && authKey.startsWith("0x")) {                                    
 735                 srcBytes = GB.hexStringToByteArray(authKey.substring(2));                                
 736             }                                                                                            
 737             System.arraycopy(srcBytes, 0, authKeyBytes, 0, Math.min(srcBytes.length, 16));               
 738         }                                                                                                
 739                                                                                                          
 740         return authKeyBytes;                                                                             
 741     }

 764             );                                                                                           
 765             String[] menuItems = new String[jsonArray.length()];                                         
 766             for (int i = 0; i < jsonArray.length(); i++) menuItems[i] = jsonArray.getString(i);          
 767                                                                                                          
 768             SharedPreferences prefs = getDeviceSpecificPreferences();                                    
 769             String upperButtonApp = prefs.getString(DeviceSettingsPreferenceConst.PREF_BUTTON_1_FUNCTION,🔵
 770             String middleButtonApp = prefs.getString(DeviceSettingsPreferenceConst.PREF_BUTTON_2_FUNCTION🔵
 771             String lowerButtonApp = prefs.getString(DeviceSettingsPreferenceConst.PREF_BUTTON_3_FUNCTION,🔵
 772                                                                                                          
 773             queueWrite(new ButtonConfigurationPutRequest(                                                
 774                     menuItems,                                                                           
 775                     upperButtonApp,                                                                      
 776                     middleButtonApp,                                                                     
 777                     lowerButtonApp,                                                                      
 778                     this                                                                                 
 779             ));

 782         }

 798     @Override                                                                                            
 799     public void handleHeartRateCharacteristic(BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic) {              
 800         super.handleHeartRateCharacteristic(characteristic);                                             
 801                                                                                                          
 802         byte[] value = characteristic.getValue();                                                        
 803                                                                                                          
 804         int heartRate = value[1];                                                                        
 805                                                                                                          
 806         logger.debug("heart rate: " + heartRate);                                                        
 807     }                                                                                                    
 808                                                                                                          
 809     @Override                                                                                            
 810     protected void handleBackgroundCharacteristic(BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic) {          
 811         super.handleBackgroundCharacteristic(characteristic);                                            
 812                                                                                                          
 813         byte[] value = characteristic.getValue();                                                        
 814                                                                                                          
 815         byte requestType = value[1];                                                                     
 816                                                                                                          
 817         if(requestType == (byte) 0x04){                                                                  
 818             handleCallRequest(value);                                                                    
 819         }else if (requestType == (byte) 0x05) {                                                          
 820             handleMusicRequest(value);                                                                   
 821         } else if (requestType == (byte) 0x01) {                                                         
 822             int eventId = value[2];                                                                      
 823             logger.info("got event id " + eventId);                                                      
 824             try {                                                                                        
 825                 String jsonString = new String(value, 3, value.length - 3);                              
 826                 logger.info(jsonString);                                                                 
 827                 JSONObject requestJson = new JSONObject(jsonString);                                     
 828                                                                                                          
 829                 JSONObject request = requestJson.getJSONObject("req");                                   
 830                 int requestId = request.getInt("id");                                                    
 831                                                                                                          
 832                 if (request.has("ringMyPhone")) {                                                        
 833                     String action = request.getJSONObject("ringMyPhone").getString("action");            
 834                     logger.info("got ringMyPhone request; " + action);                                   
 835                     GBDeviceEventFindPhone findPhoneEvent = new GBDeviceEventFindPhone();                
 836                                                                                                          
 837                     JSONObject responseObject = new JSONObject()                                         
 838                             .put("res", new JSONObject()                                                 
 839                                     .put("id", requestId)                                                
 840                                     .put("set", new JSONObject()                                         
 841                                             .put("ringMyPhone", new JSONObject()                         
 842                                             )                                                            
 843                                     )                                                                    
 844                             );                                                                           
 845                                                                                                          
 846                     if ("on".equals(action)) {                                                           
 847                         findPhoneEvent.event = GBDeviceEventFindPhone.Event.START;                       
 848                         getDeviceSupport().evaluateGBDeviceEvent(findPhoneEvent);                        
 849                         responseObject                                                                   
 850                                 .getJSONObject("res")                                                    
 851                                 .getJSONObject("set")                                                    
 852                                 .getJSONObject("ringMyPhone")                                            
 853                                 .put("result", "on");                                                    
 854                         queueWrite(new JsonPutRequest(responseObject, this));                            
 855                     } else if ("off".equals(action)) {                                                   
 856                         findPhoneEvent.event = GBDeviceEventFindPhone.Event.STOP;                        
 857                         getDeviceSupport().evaluateGBDeviceEvent(findPhoneEvent);                        
 858                         responseObject                                                                   
 859                                 .getJSONObject("res")                                                    
 860                                 .getJSONObject("set")                                                    
 861                                 .getJSONObject("ringMyPhone")                                            
 862                                 .put("result", "off");                                                   
 863                         queueWrite(new JsonPutRequest(responseObject, this));                            
 864                     }                                                                                    
 865                 } else if (request.has("weatherInfo") || request.has("weatherApp._.config.locations")) { 
 866                     logger.info("Got weatherInfo request");                                              
 867                     WeatherSpec weatherSpec = Weather.getInstance().getWeatherSpec();                    
 868                     if (weatherSpec != null) {                                                           
 869                         onSendWeather(weatherSpec);                                                      
 870                     } else {                                                                             
 871                         logger.info("no weather data available  - ignoring request");                    
 872                     }                                                                                    
 873                 } else if (request.has("commuteApp._.config.commute_info")) {                            
 874                     String action = request.getJSONObject("commuteApp._.config.commute_info")            
 875                             .getString("dest");                                                          
 876                                                                                                          
 877                     String startStop = request.getJSONObject("commuteApp._.config.commute_info")         
 878                             .getString("action");                                                        
 879                                                                                                          
 880                     if (startStop.equals("stop")) {                                                      
 881                         // overwriteButtons(null);                                                       
 882                         return;                                                                          
 883                     }                                                                                    
 884                                                                                                          
 885                     queueWrite(new SetCommuteMenuMessage("Anfrage wird weitergeleitet...", false, this));
 886                                                                                                          
 887                     Intent menuIntent = new Intent(QHybridSupport.QHYBRID_EVENT_COMMUTE_MENU);           
 888                     menuIntent.putExtra("EXTRA_ACTION", action);                                         
 889                     getContext().sendBroadcast(menuIntent);                                              
 890                 } else {                                                                                 
 891                     logger.warn("Unhandled request from watch: " + requestJson.toString());              
 892                 }                                                                                        
 893             } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                  
 894                 e.printStackTrace();                                                                     
 895             }                                                                                            
 896         }                                                                                                
 897     }                                                                                                    
 898                                                                                                          
 899     private void handleCallRequest(byte[] value) {                                                       
 900         boolean acceptCall = value[7] == (byte) 0x00;                                                    
 901         queueWrite(new PlayCallNotificationRequest("", false, this));                                    
 902                                                                                                          
 903         GBDeviceEventCallControl callControlEvent = new GBDeviceEventCallControl();                      
 904         callControlEvent.event = acceptCall ? GBDeviceEventCallControl.Event.START : GBDeviceEventCallCon🔵
 905                                                                                                          
 906         getDeviceSupport().evaluateGBDeviceEvent(callControlEvent);                                      
 907     }                                                                                                    
 908                                                                                                          
 909     private void handleMusicRequest(byte[] value) {                                                      
 910         byte command = value[3];                                                                         
 911         logger.info("got music command: " + command);                                                    
 912         MUSIC_WATCH_REQUEST request = MUSIC_WATCH_REQUEST.fromCommandByte(command);                      
 913                                                                                                          
 914         GBDeviceEventMusicControl deviceEventMusicControl = new GBDeviceEventMusicControl();             
 915         deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.PLAY;                            
 916                                                                                                          
 917         // TODO add skipping/seeking                                                                     
 918                                                                                                          
 919         switch (request) {                                                                               
 920             case MUSIC_REQUEST_PLAY_PAUSE: {                                                             
 921                 queueWrite(new MusicControlRequest(MUSIC_PHONE_REQUEST.MUSIC_REQUEST_PLAY_PAUSE));       
 922                 deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.PLAYPAUSE;               
 923                 break;                                                                                   
 924             }                                                                                            
 925             case MUSIC_REQUEST_NEXT: {                                                                   
 926                 queueWrite(new MusicControlRequest(MUSIC_PHONE_REQUEST.MUSIC_REQUEST_NEXT));             
 927                 deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.NEXT;                    
 928                 break;                                                                                   
 929             }                                                                                            
 930             case MUSIC_REQUEST_PREVIOUS: {                                                               
 931                 queueWrite(new MusicControlRequest(MUSIC_PHONE_REQUEST.MUSIC_REQUEST_PREVIOUS));         
 932                 deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.PREVIOUS;                
 933                 break;                                                                                   
 934             }                                                                                            
 935             case MUSIC_REQUEST_LOUDER: {                                                                 
 936                 queueWrite(new MusicControlRequest(MUSIC_PHONE_REQUEST.MUSIC_REQUEST_LOUDER));           
 937                 deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.VOLUMEUP;                
 938                 break;                                                                                   
 939             }                                                                                            
 940             case MUSIC_REQUEST_QUITER: {                                                                 
 941                 queueWrite(new MusicControlRequest(MUSIC_PHONE_REQUEST.MUSIC_REQUEST_QUITER));           
 942                 deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.VOLUMEDOWN;              
 943                 break;                                                                                   
 944             }                                                                                            
 945         }                                                                                                
 946                                                                                                          
 947         getDeviceSupport().evaluateGBDeviceEvent(deviceEventMusicControl);                               
 948     }

 101     @Override                                                                                            
 102     public void initialize() {                                                                           
 103         if (Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= Build.VERSION_CODES.LOLLIPOP) {                                     
 104             queueWrite(new RequestMtuRequest(512));                                                      
 105         }                                                                                                
 106                                                                                                          
 107         queueWrite(new SetDeviceStateRequest(GBDevice.State.AUTHENTICATING));                            
 108                                                                                                          
 109         negotiateSymmetricKey();                                                                         
 110                                                                                                          
 111         queueWrite(new SetDeviceStateRequest(GBDevice.State.INITIALIZING));                              
 112                                                                                                          
 113         loadNotificationConfigurations();                                                                
 114         queueWrite(new NotificationFilterPutHRRequest(this.notificationConfigurations, this));           
 115         setVibrationStrength();                                                                          
 116                                                                                                          
 117         syncSettings();                                                                                  
 118                                                                                                          
 119         setTime();                                                                                       
 120                                                                                                          
 121         overwriteButtons(null);                                                                          
 122                                                                                                          
 123                                                                                                          
 124         loadBackground();                                                                                
 125         loadWidgets();                                                                                   
 126         // renderWidgets();                                                                              
 127         // dunno if there is any point in doing this at start since when no watch is connected the QHybri🔵
 128                                                                                                          
 129         queueWrite(new SetDeviceStateRequest(GBDevice.State.INITIALIZED));                               
 130     }

 132     private void setVibrationStrength() {                                                                
 133         Prefs prefs = new Prefs(getDeviceSpecificPreferences());                                         
 134         int vibrationStrengh = prefs.getInt(DeviceSettingsPreferenceConst.PREF_VIBRATION_STRENGH_PERCENTA🔵
 135         if (vibrationStrengh > 0) {                                                                      
 136             vibrationStrengh = (vibrationStrengh + 1) * 25; // Seems 0,50,75,100 are working...          
 137         }                                                                                                
 138         setVibrationStrength((short) (vibrationStrengh));                                                
 139     }

 145     }

 147     private void loadNotificationConfigurations(){                                                       
 148         this.notificationConfigurations = new NotificationHRConfiguration[]{

 154     private File getBackgroundFile(){                                                                    
 155         return new File(getContext().getExternalFilesDir(null), "hr_background.bin");                    
 156     }                                                                                                    
 157                                                                                                          
 158     private void loadBackground(){                                                                       
 159         try {                                                                                            
 160             FileInputStream fis = new FileInputStream(getBackgroundFile());                              
 161             int count = fis.available();                                                                 
 162             if(count != 14400){                                                                          
 163                 throw new RuntimeException("wrong background file length");                              
 164             }                                                                                            
 165             byte[] file = new byte[14400];                                                               
 166             fis.read(file);                                                                              
 167             fis.close();                                                                                 
 168             this.backGroundImage = AssetImageFactory.createAssetImage(file, 0, 0, 0);                    
 169         } catch (FileNotFoundException e) {                                                              
 170             SharedPreferences preferences = getDeviceSpecificPreferences();                              
 171             if (preferences.getBoolean("force_white_color_scheme", false)) {                             
 172             Bitmap whiteBitmap = Bitmap.createBitmap(239, 239, Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888);                 
 173             new Canvas(whiteBitmap).drawColor(Color.WHITE);                                              
 174                                                                                                          
 175             try {                                                                                        
 176                 this.backGroundImage = AssetImageFactory.createAssetImage(whiteBitmap, true, 0, 1, 0);   
 177                     queueWrite(new AssetFilePutRequest(this.backGroundImage, (byte) 0x00, this));        
 178                 } catch (IOException e2) {                                                               
 179                     logger.error("Backgroundimage error", e2);                                           
 180             }                                                                                            
 181         }                                                                                                
 182         } catch (IOException | RuntimeException e) {                                                     
 183             GB.log("error opening background file", GB.ERROR, e);                                        
 184             GB.toast("error opening background file", Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.ERROR);                      
 185         }                                                                                                
 186     }                                                                                                    
 187                                                                                                          
 188     @Override                                                                                            
 189     public void setBackgroundImage(byte[] pixels) {                                                      
 190         if(pixels == null){                                                                              
 191             getBackgroundFile().delete();                                                                
 192             this.backGroundImage = null;                                                                 
 193         }else{                                                                                           
 194             this.backGroundImage = AssetImageFactory.createAssetImage(pixels, 0, 0, 0);                  
 195             try {                                                                                        
 196                 FileOutputStream fos = new FileOutputStream(getBackgroundFile(), false);                 
 197                 fos.write(pixels);                                                                       
 198             } catch (IOException e) {                                                                    
 199                 GB.log("error saving background", GB.ERROR, e);                                          
 200                 GB.toast("error persistent saving background", Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.ERROR);             
 201             }                                                                                            
 202         }                                                                                                
 203         renderWidgets();                                                                                 
 204     }

 206     private void loadWidgets() {                                                                         
 207         Prefs prefs = new Prefs(GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(getDeviceSupport().getDevice()🔵
 208         boolean forceWhiteBackground = prefs.getBoolean("force_white_color_scheme", false);              
 209         String fontColor = forceWhiteBackground ? "black" : "default";                                   
 210                                                                                                          
 211         this.widgets.clear();                                                                            
 212         String widgetJson = GBApplication.getPrefs().getPreferences().getString("FOSSIL_HR_WIDGETS", "{}"🔵
 213         String customWidgetJson = GBApplication.getPrefs().getString("QHYBRID_CUSTOM_WIDGETS", "[]");    
 214                                                                                                          
 215         try {                                                                                            
 216             JSONObject widgetConfig = new JSONObject(widgetJson);                                        
 217             JSONArray customWidgets = new JSONArray(customWidgetJson);                                   
 218                                                                                                          
 219             Iterator<String> keyIterator = widgetConfig.keys();                                          
 220             HashMap<String, Integer> positionMap = new HashMap<>(4);                                     
 221             positionMap.put("top", 0);                                                                   
 222             positionMap.put("right", 90);                                                                
 223             positionMap.put("bottom", 180);                                                              
 224             positionMap.put("left", 270);                                                                
 225                                                                                                          
 226             while(keyIterator.hasNext()){                                                                
 227                 String position = keyIterator.next();                                                    
 228                 String identifier = widgetConfig.getString(position);                                    
 229                 Widget.WidgetType type = Widget.WidgetType.fromJsonIdentifier(identifier);               
 230                                                                                                          
 231                 Widget widget = null;                                                                    
 232                 if(type != null) {                                                                       
 233                     widget = new Widget(type, positionMap.get(position), 63, fontColor);                 
 234                 }else{                                                                                   
 235                     identifier = identifier.substring(7);                                                
 236                     for(int i = 0; i < customWidgets.length(); i++){                                     
 237                         JSONObject customWidget = customWidgets.getJSONObject(i);                        
 238                         if(customWidget.getString("name").equals(identifier)){                           
 239                             boolean drawCircle = false;                                                  
 240                             if(customWidget.has("drawCircle")) drawCircle = customWidget.getBoolean("draw🔵
 241                             CustomWidget newWidget = new CustomWidget(                                   
 242                                     customWidget.getString("name"),                                      
 243                                     positionMap.get(position),                                           
 244                                     63,                                                                  
 245                                     fontColor                                                            
 246                             );                                                                           
 247                             JSONArray elements = customWidget.getJSONArray("elements");                  
 248                                                                                                          
 249                             for (int i2 = 0; i2 < elements.length(); i2++) {                             
 250                                 JSONObject element = elements.getJSONObject(i2);                         
 251                                 if (element.getString("type").equals("text")) {                          
 252                                     newWidget.addElement(new CustomTextWidgetElement(                    
 253                                             element.getString("id"),                                     
 254                                             element.getString("value"),                                  
 255                                             element.getInt("x"),                                         
 256                                             element.getInt("y")                                          
 257                                     ));                                                                  
 258                                 } else if (element.getString("type").equals("background")) {             
 259                                     newWidget.addElement(new CustomBackgroundWidgetElement(              
 260                                             element.getString("id"),                                     
 261                                             element.getString("value")                                   
 262                                     ));                                                                  
 263                                 }                                                                        
 264                             }                                                                            
 265                             widget = newWidget;                                                          
 266                         }                                                                                
 267                     }                                                                                    
 268                 }                                                                                        
 269                                                                                                          
 270                 if(widget == null) continue;                                                             
 271                 this.widgets.add(widget);                                                                
 272             }                                                                                            
 273         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 274             e.printStackTrace();                                                                         
 275         }                                                                                                
 276                                                                                                          
 277         uploadWidgets();                                                                                 
 278     }

 280     private void uploadWidgets(){                                                                        
 281         negotiateSymmetricKey();                                                                         
 282         ArrayList<Widget> systemWidgets = new ArrayList<>(widgets.size());                               
 283         for(Widget widget : this.widgets){                                                               
 284             if(!(widget instanceof CustomWidget)) systemWidgets.add(widget);                             
 285         }                                                                                                
 286         queueWrite(new WidgetsPutRequest(systemWidgets.toArray(new Widget[0]), this));                   
 287     }

 435     @Override                                                                                            
 436     public void setWidgetContent(String widgetID, String content, boolean renderOnWatch) {               
 437         boolean update = false;                                                                          
 438         for (Widget widget : this.widgets) {                                                             
 439             if(!(widget instanceof CustomWidget)) continue;                                              
 440             if(((CustomWidget) widget).updateElementValue(widgetID, content)) update = true;             
 441         }                                                                                                
 442                                                                                                          
 443         if (renderOnWatch && update) renderWidgets();                                                    
 444     }                                                                                                    
 445                                                                                                          
 446     private void negotiateSymmetricKey() {                                                               
 447         queueWrite(new VerifyPrivateKeyRequest(                                                          
 448                 this.getSecretKey(),                                                                     
 449                 this                                                                                     
 450         ));                                                                                              
 451     }                                                                                                    
 452                                                                                                          
 453     @Override                                                                                            
 454     public void setTime() {                                                                              
 455         negotiateSymmetricKey();                                                                         
 456                                                                                                          
 457         long millis = System.currentTimeMillis();                                                        
 458         TimeZone zone = new GregorianCalendar().getTimeZone();                                           
 459                                                                                                          
 460         queueWrite(                                                                                      
 461                 new ConfigurationPutRequest(                                                             
 462                         new TimeConfigItem(                                                              
 463                                 (int) (millis / 1000 + getDeviceSupport().getTimeOffset() * 60),         
 464                                 (short) (millis % 1000),                                                 
 465                                 (short) (zone.getOffset(millis) / 60000)                                 
 466                         ),                                                                               
 467                         this), false                                                                     
 468         );                                                                                               
 469     }                                                                                                    
 470                                                                                                          
 471     @Override                                                                                            
 472     public void setMusicInfo(MusicSpec musicSpec) {                                                      
 473         if (                                                                                             
 474                 currentSpec != null                                                                      
 475                         && currentSpec.album.equals(musicSpec.album)                                     
 476                         && currentSpec.artist.equals(musicSpec.artist)                                   
 477                         && currentSpec.track.equals(musicSpec.track)                                     
 478         ) return;                                                                                        
 479         currentSpec = musicSpec;                                                                         
 480         try {                                                                                            
 481             queueWrite(new MusicInfoSetRequest(                                                          
 482                     musicSpec.artist,                                                                    
 483                     musicSpec.album,                                                                     
 484                     musicSpec.track,                                                                     
 485                     this                                                                                 
 486             ));                                                                                          
 487         }catch (BufferOverflowException e){                                                              
 488             GB.log("musicInfo: " + musicSpec, GB.ERROR, e);                                              
 489         }                                                                                                
 490     }                                                                                                    
 491

 493     public void setMusicState(MusicStateSpec stateSpec) {                                                
 494         super.setMusicState(stateSpec);                                                                  
 495                                                                                                          
 496         queueWrite(new MusicControlRequest(                                                              
 497                 stateSpec.state == MusicStateSpec.STATE_PLAYING ? MUSIC_PHONE_REQUEST.MUSIC_REQUEST_SET_P🔵
 498         ));                                                                                              
 499     }

 501     @Override                                                                                            
 502     public void updateWidgets() {

 504         renderWidgets();                                                                                 
 505     }

 523     public boolean playRawNotification(NotificationSpec notificationSpec) {                              
 524         String senderOrTitle = StringUtils.getFirstOf(notificationSpec.sender, notificationSpec.title);  
 525                                                                                                          
 526         try {                                                                                            
 527             for (NotificationHRConfiguration configuration : this.notificationConfigurations){           
 528                 if(configuration.getPackageName().equals(notificationSpec.sourceAppId)){                 
 529                     queueWrite(new PlayTextNotificationRequest(notificationSpec.sourceAppId, senderOrTitl🔵
 530                     return true;                                                                         
 531                 }                                                                                        
 532             }                                                                                            
 533             queueWrite(new PlayTextNotificationRequest("generic", senderOrTitle, notificationSpec.body, t🔵
 534         }catch (Exception e){                                                                            
 535             e.printStackTrace();                                                                         
 536         }                                                                                                
 537         return true;                                                                                     
 538     }
