 565     // this method is based on the one from AppMessageHandlerYWeather.java                               
 566     private int getIconForConditionCode(int conditionCode, boolean isNight) {                            
 567         final int CLEAR_DAY = 0;                                                                         
 568         final int CLEAR_NIGHT = 1;                                                                       
 569         final int CLOUDY = 2;                                                                            
 570         final int PARTLY_CLOUDY_DAY = 3;                                                                 
 571         final int PARTLY_CLOUDY_NIGHT = 4;                                                               
 572         final int RAIN = 5;                                                                              
 573         final int SNOW = 6;                                                                              
 574         final int SNOW_2 = 7; // same as 6?                                                              
 575         final int THUNDERSTORM = 8;                                                                      
 576         final int CLOUDY_2 = 9; // same as 2?                                                            
 577         final int WINDY = 10;                                                                            
 578                                                                                                          
 579         if (conditionCode == 800 || conditionCode == 951) {                                              
 580             return isNight ? CLEAR_NIGHT : CLEAR_DAY;                                                    
 581         } else if (conditionCode > 800 && conditionCode < 900) {                                         
 582             return isNight ? PARTLY_CLOUDY_NIGHT : PARTLY_CLOUDY_DAY;                                    
 583         } else if (conditionCode >= 300 && conditionCode < 400) {                                        
 584             return RAIN; // drizzle mapped to rain                                                       
 585         } else if (conditionCode >= 500 && conditionCode < 600) {                                        
 586             return RAIN;                                                                                 
 587         } else if (conditionCode >= 700 && conditionCode < 732) {                                        
 588             return CLOUDY;                                                                               
 589         } else if (conditionCode == 741 || conditionCode == 751 || conditionCode == 761 || conditionCode 🔵
 590             return CLOUDY; // fog mapped to cloudy                                                       
 591         } else if (conditionCode == 771) {                                                               
 592             return CLOUDY; // squalls mapped to cloudy                                                   
 593         } else if (conditionCode == 781) {                                                               
 594             return WINDY; // tornato mapped to windy                                                     
 595         } else if (conditionCode >= 200 && conditionCode < 300) {                                        
 596             return THUNDERSTORM;                                                                         
 597         } else if (conditionCode >= 600 && conditionCode <= 602) {                                       
 598             return SNOW;                                                                                 
 599         } else if (conditionCode >= 611 && conditionCode <= 622) {                                       
 600             return RAIN;                                                                                 
 601         } else if (conditionCode == 906) {                                                               
 602             return RAIN; // hail mapped to rain                                                          
 603         } else if (conditionCode >= 907 && conditionCode < 957) {                                        
 604             return WINDY;                                                                                
 605         } else if (conditionCode == 905) {                                                               
 606             return WINDY;                                                                                
 607         } else if (conditionCode == 900) {                                                               
 608             return WINDY;                                                                                
 609         } else if (conditionCode == 901 || conditionCode == 902 || conditionCode == 962) {               
 610             return WINDY;                                                                                
 611         }                                                                                                
 612         return isNight ? CLEAR_NIGHT : CLEAR_DAY;                                                        
 613     }

 615     @Override                                                                                            
 616     public void onSendWeather(WeatherSpec weatherSpec) {                                                 
 617         long ts = System.currentTimeMillis();                                                            
 618         ts /= 1000;                                                                                      
 619         try {                                                                                            
 620             JSONObject responseObject = new JSONObject()                                                 
 621                     .put("res", new JSONObject()                                                         
 622                             .put("id", 0) // seems the id does not matter?                               
 623                             .put("set", new JSONObject()                                                 
 624                                     .put("weatherInfo", new JSONObject()                                 
 625                                             .put("alive", ts + 60 * 60)                                  
 626                                             .put("unit", "c") // FIXME: do not hardcode                  
 627                                             .put("temp", weatherSpec.currentTemp - 273)                  
 628                                             .put("cond_id", getIconForConditionCode(weatherSpec.currentCo🔵
 629                                     )                                                                    
 630                             )                                                                            
 631                     );                                                                                   
 632                                                                                                          
 633             queueWrite(new JsonPutRequest(responseObject, this));                                        
 634                                                                                                          
 635             JSONArray forecastWeekArray = new JSONArray();                                               
 636             final String[] weekdays = {"", "Sun", "Mon", "Tue", "Wed", "Thu", "Fri", "Sat"};             
 637             Calendar cal = Calendar.getInstance();                                                       
 638             cal.setTimeInMillis(weatherSpec.timestamp * 1000L);                                          
 639             int i = 0;                                                                                   
 640             for (WeatherSpec.Forecast forecast : weatherSpec.forecasts) {                                
 641                 cal.add(Calendar.DATE, 1);                                                               
 642                 int dayOfWeek = cal.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_WEEK);                                           
 643                 forecastWeekArray.put(new JSONObject()                                                   
 644                         .put("day", weekdays[dayOfWeek])                                                 
 645                         .put("cond_id", getIconForConditionCode(forecast.conditionCode, false)) // FIXME 🔵
 646                         .put("high", forecast.maxTemp - 273)                                             
 647                         .put("low", forecast.minTemp - 273)                                              
 648                 );                                                                                       
 649                 if (++i == 3) break; // max 3                                                            
 650             }                                                                                            
 651                                                                                                          
 652             JSONArray forecastDayArray = new JSONArray();                                                
 653             final int[] hours = {0, 0, 0};                                                               
 654                                                                                                          
 655             for (int hour : hours) {                                                                     
 656                 forecastDayArray.put(new JSONObject()                                                    
 657                         .put("hour", hour)                                                               
 658                         .put("cond_id", 0)                                                               
 659                         .put("temp", 0)                                                                  
 660                 );                                                                                       
 661             }                                                                                            
 662                                                                                                          
 663                                                                                                          
 664             JSONObject forecastResponseObject = new JSONObject()                                         
 665                     .put("res", new JSONObject()                                                         
 666                             .put("id", 0)                                                                
 667                             .put("set", new JSONObject()                                                 
 668                                     .put("weatherApp._.config.locations", new JSONArray()                
 669                                             .put(new JSONObject()                                        
 670                                                     .put("alive", ts + 60 * 60)                          
 671                                                     .put("city", weatherSpec.location)                   
 672                                                     .put("unit", "c") // FIXME: do not hardcode          
 673                                                     .put("temp", weatherSpec.currentTemp - 273)          
 674                                                     .put("high", weatherSpec.todayMaxTemp - 273)         
 675                                                     .put("low", weatherSpec.todayMinTemp - 273)          
 676                                                     .put("rain", 0)                                      
 677                                                     .put("cond_id", getIconForConditionCode(weatherSpec.c🔵
 678                                                     .put("forecast_day", forecastDayArray)               
 679                                                     .put("forecast_week", forecastWeekArray)             
 680                                             )                                                            
 681                                     )                                                                    
 682                             )                                                                            
 683                     );                                                                                   
 684                                                                                                          
 685             queueWrite(new JsonPutRequest(forecastResponseObject, this));                                
 686                                                                                                          
 687         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 688             logger.error("JSON exception: ", e);                                                         
 689         }                                                                                                
 690     }

 721     public byte[] getSecretKey() {                                                                       
 722         byte[] authKeyBytes = new byte[16];                                                              
 723                                                                                                          
 724         SharedPreferences sharedPrefs = GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(getDeviceSupport().get🔵
 725                                                                                                          
 726         String authKey = sharedPrefs.getString("authkey", null);                                         
 727         if (authKey != null && !authKey.isEmpty()) {                                                     
 728             byte[] srcBytes = authKey.trim().getBytes();                                                 
 729             if (authKey.length() == 34 && authKey.startsWith("0x")) {                                    
 730                 srcBytes = GB.hexStringToByteArray(authKey.substring(2));                                
 731             }                                                                                            
 732             System.arraycopy(srcBytes, 0, authKeyBytes, 0, Math.min(srcBytes.length, 16));               
 733         }                                                                                                
 734                                                                                                          
 735         return authKeyBytes;                                                                             
 736     }

 754     @Override                                                                                            
 755     public void overwriteButtons(String jsonConfigString) {                                              
 756         try {                                                                                            
 757             JSONArray jsonArray = new JSONArray(                                                         
 758                     GBApplication.getPrefs().getString(HRConfigActivity.CONFIG_KEY_Q_ACTIONS, "[]")      
 759             );                                                                                           
 760             String[] menuItems = new String[jsonArray.length()];                                         
 761             for (int i = 0; i < jsonArray.length(); i++) menuItems[i] = jsonArray.getString(i);          
 762                                                                                                          
 763             SharedPreferences prefs = getDeviceSpecificPreferences();                                    
 764             String upperButtonApp = prefs.getString(DeviceSettingsPreferenceConst.PREF_BUTTON_1_FUNCTION,🔵
 765             String middleButtonApp = prefs.getString(DeviceSettingsPreferenceConst.PREF_BUTTON_2_FUNCTION🔵
 766             String lowerButtonApp = prefs.getString(DeviceSettingsPreferenceConst.PREF_BUTTON_3_FUNCTION,🔵
 767                                                                                                          
 768             queueWrite(new ButtonConfigurationPutRequest(                                                
 769                     menuItems,                                                                           
 770                     upperButtonApp,                                                                      
 771                     middleButtonApp,                                                                     
 772                     lowerButtonApp,                                                                      
 773                     this                                                                                 
 774             ));                                                                                          
 775         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 776             e.printStackTrace();                                                                         
 777         }                                                                                                
 778     }

 781     public void onSendConfiguration(String config) {                                                     
 782         switch (config) {                                                                                
 783             case DeviceSettingsPreferenceConst.PREF_BUTTON_1_FUNCTION:                                   
 784             case DeviceSettingsPreferenceConst.PREF_BUTTON_2_FUNCTION:                                   
 785             case DeviceSettingsPreferenceConst.PREF_BUTTON_3_FUNCTION:                                   
 786                 overwriteButtons(null);                                                                  
 787                 break;                                                                                   
 788             case DeviceSettingsPreferenceConst.PREF_VIBRATION_STRENGH_PERCENTAGE:                        
 789                 setVibrationStrength();                                                                  
 790         }                                                                                                
 791     }

 793     @Override                                                                                            
 794     public void handleHeartRateCharacteristic(BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic) {              
 795         super.handleHeartRateCharacteristic(characteristic);                                             
 796                                                                                                          
 797         byte[] value = characteristic.getValue();                                                        
 798                                                                                                          
 799         int heartRate = value[1];                                                                        
 800                                                                                                          
 801         logger.debug("heart rate: " + heartRate);                                                        
 802     }

 804     @Override                                                                                            
 805     protected void handleBackgroundCharacteristic(BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic) {          
 806         super.handleBackgroundCharacteristic(characteristic);                                            
 807                                                                                                          
 808         byte[] value = characteristic.getValue();                                                        
 809                                                                                                          
 810         byte requestType = value[1];                                                                     
 811                                                                                                          
 812         if(requestType == (byte) 0x04){                                                                  
 813             handleCallRequest(value);                                                                    
 814         }else if (requestType == (byte) 0x05) {                                                          
 815             handleMusicRequest(value);                                                                   
 816         } else if (requestType == (byte) 0x01) {                                                         
 817             int eventId = value[2];                                                                      
 818             logger.info("got event id " + eventId);                                                      
 819             try {                                                                                        
 820                 String jsonString = new String(value, 3, value.length - 3);                              
 821                 logger.info(jsonString);                                                                 
 822                 JSONObject requestJson = new JSONObject(jsonString);                                     
 823                                                                                                          
 824                 JSONObject request = requestJson.getJSONObject("req");                                   
 825                 int requestId = request.getInt("id");                                                    
 826                                                                                                          
 827                 if (request.has("ringMyPhone")) {                                                        
 828                     String action = request.getJSONObject("ringMyPhone").getString("action");            
 829                     logger.info("got ringMyPhone request; " + action);                                   
 830                     GBDeviceEventFindPhone findPhoneEvent = new GBDeviceEventFindPhone();                
 831                                                                                                          
 832                     JSONObject responseObject = new JSONObject()                                         
 833                             .put("res", new JSONObject()                                                 
 834                                     .put("id", requestId)                                                
 835                                     .put("set", new JSONObject()                                         
 836                                             .put("ringMyPhone", new JSONObject()                         
 837                                             )                                                            
 838                                     )                                                                    
 839                             );                                                                           
 840                                                                                                          
 841                     if ("on".equals(action)) {                                                           
 842                         findPhoneEvent.event = GBDeviceEventFindPhone.Event.START;                       
 843                         getDeviceSupport().evaluateGBDeviceEvent(findPhoneEvent);                        
 844                         responseObject                                                                   
 845                                 .getJSONObject("res")                                                    
 846                                 .getJSONObject("set")                                                    
 847                                 .getJSONObject("ringMyPhone")                                            
 848                                 .put("result", "on");                                                    
 849                         queueWrite(new JsonPutRequest(responseObject, this));                            
 850                     } else if ("off".equals(action)) {                                                   
 851                         findPhoneEvent.event = GBDeviceEventFindPhone.Event.STOP;                        
 852                         getDeviceSupport().evaluateGBDeviceEvent(findPhoneEvent);                        
 853                         responseObject                                                                   
 854                                 .getJSONObject("res")                                                    
 855                                 .getJSONObject("set")                                                    
 856                                 .getJSONObject("ringMyPhone")                                            
 857                                 .put("result", "off");                                                   
 858                         queueWrite(new JsonPutRequest(responseObject, this));                            
 859                     }                                                                                    
 860                 } else if (request.has("weatherInfo") || request.has("weatherApp._.config.locations")) { 
 861                     logger.info("Got weatherInfo request");                                              
 862                     WeatherSpec weatherSpec = Weather.getInstance().getWeatherSpec();                    
 863                     if (weatherSpec != null) {                                                           
 864                         onSendWeather(weatherSpec);                                                      
 865                     } else {                                                                             
 866                         logger.info("no weather data available  - ignoring request");                    
 867                     }                                                                                    
 868                 } else if (request.has("commuteApp._.config.commute_info")) {                            
 869                     String action = request.getJSONObject("commuteApp._.config.commute_info")            
 870                             .getString("dest");                                                          
 871                                                                                                          
 872                     String startStop = request.getJSONObject("commuteApp._.config.commute_info")         
 873                             .getString("action");                                                        
 874                                                                                                          
 875                     if (startStop.equals("stop")) {                                                      
 876                         // overwriteButtons(null);                                                       
 877                         return;                                                                          
 878                     }                                                                                    
 879                                                                                                          
 880                     queueWrite(new SetCommuteMenuMessage("Anfrage wird weitergeleitet...", false, this));
 881                                                                                                          
 882                     Intent menuIntent = new Intent(QHybridSupport.QHYBRID_EVENT_COMMUTE_MENU);           
 883                     menuIntent.putExtra("EXTRA_ACTION", action);                                         
 884                     getContext().sendBroadcast(menuIntent);                                              
 885                 } else {                                                                                 
 886                     logger.warn("Unhandled request from watch: " + requestJson.toString());              
 887                 }                                                                                        
 888             } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                  
 889                 e.printStackTrace();                                                                     
 890             }                                                                                            
 891         }                                                                                                
 892     }                                                                                                    
 893                                                                                                          
 894     private void handleCallRequest(byte[] value) {                                                       
 895         boolean acceptCall = value[7] == (byte) 0x00;                                                    
 896         queueWrite(new PlayCallNotificationRequest("", false, this));                                    
 897                                                                                                          
 898         GBDeviceEventCallControl callControlEvent = new GBDeviceEventCallControl();                      
 899         callControlEvent.event = acceptCall ? GBDeviceEventCallControl.Event.START : GBDeviceEventCallCon🔵
 900                                                                                                          
 901         getDeviceSupport().evaluateGBDeviceEvent(callControlEvent);                                      
 902     }                                                                                                    
 903                                                                                                          
 904     private void handleMusicRequest(byte[] value) {                                                      
 905         byte command = value[3];                                                                         
 906         logger.info("got music command: " + command);                                                    
 907         MUSIC_WATCH_REQUEST request = MUSIC_WATCH_REQUEST.fromCommandByte(command);                      
 908                                                                                                          
 909         GBDeviceEventMusicControl deviceEventMusicControl = new GBDeviceEventMusicControl();             
 910         deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.PLAY;                            
 911                                                                                                          
 912         // TODO add skipping/seeking                                                                     
 913                                                                                                          
 914         switch (request) {                                                                               
 915             case MUSIC_REQUEST_PLAY_PAUSE: {                                                             
 916                 queueWrite(new MusicControlRequest(MUSIC_PHONE_REQUEST.MUSIC_REQUEST_PLAY_PAUSE));       
 917                 deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.PLAYPAUSE;               
 918                 break;                                                                                   
 919             }                                                                                            
 920             case MUSIC_REQUEST_NEXT: {                                                                   
 921                 queueWrite(new MusicControlRequest(MUSIC_PHONE_REQUEST.MUSIC_REQUEST_NEXT));             
 922                 deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.NEXT;                    
 923                 break;                                                                                   
 924             }                                                                                            
 925             case MUSIC_REQUEST_PREVIOUS: {                                                               
 926                 queueWrite(new MusicControlRequest(MUSIC_PHONE_REQUEST.MUSIC_REQUEST_PREVIOUS));         
 927                 deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.PREVIOUS;                
 928                 break;                                                                                   
 929             }                                                                                            
 930             case MUSIC_REQUEST_LOUDER: {                                                                 
 931                 queueWrite(new MusicControlRequest(MUSIC_PHONE_REQUEST.MUSIC_REQUEST_LOUDER));           
 932                 deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.VOLUMEUP;                
 933                 break;                                                                                   
 934             }                                                                                            
 935             case MUSIC_REQUEST_QUITER: {                                                                 
 936                 queueWrite(new MusicControlRequest(MUSIC_PHONE_REQUEST.MUSIC_REQUEST_QUITER));           
 937                 deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.VOLUMEDOWN;              
 938                 break;                                                                                   
 939             }                                                                                            
 940         }                                                                                                
 941                                                                                                          
 942         getDeviceSupport().evaluateGBDeviceEvent(deviceEventMusicControl);                               
 943     }

 100     @Override                                                                                            
 101     public void initialize() {                                                                           
 102         if (Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= Build.VERSION_CODES.LOLLIPOP) {                                     
 103             queueWrite(new RequestMtuRequest(512));                                                      
 104         }                                                                                                
 105                                                                                                          
 106         queueWrite(new SetDeviceStateRequest(GBDevice.State.AUTHENTICATING));                            
 107                                                                                                          
 108         negotiateSymmetricKey();                                                                         
 109                                                                                                          
 110         queueWrite(new SetDeviceStateRequest(GBDevice.State.INITIALIZING));                              
 111                                                                                                          
 112         loadNotificationConfigurations();                                                                
 113         queueWrite(new NotificationFilterPutHRRequest(this.notificationConfigurations, this));           
 114         setVibrationStrength();                                                                          
 115                                                                                                          
 116         syncSettings();                                                                                  
 117                                                                                                          
 118         setTime();                                                                                       
 119                                                                                                          
 120         overwriteButtons(null);                                                                          
 121                                                                                                          
 122                                                                                                          
 123         loadBackground();                                                                                
 124         loadWidgets();                                                                                   
 125         // renderWidgets();                                                                              
 126         // dunno if there is any point in doing this at start since when no watch is connected the QHybri🔵
 127                                                                                                          
 128         queueWrite(new SetDeviceStateRequest(GBDevice.State.INITIALIZED));                               
 129     }

 131     private void setVibrationStrength() {                                                                
 132         Prefs prefs = new Prefs(getDeviceSpecificPreferences());                                         
 133         int vibrationStrengh = prefs.getInt(DeviceSettingsPreferenceConst.PREF_VIBRATION_STRENGH_PERCENTA🔵
 134         if (vibrationStrengh > 0) {                                                                      
 135             vibrationStrengh = (vibrationStrengh + 1) * 25; // Seems 0,50,75,100 are working...          
 136         }                                                                                                
 137         setVibrationStrength((short) (vibrationStrengh));                                                
 138     }

 153     private File getBackgroundFile(){                                                                    
 154         return new File(getContext().getExternalFilesDir(null), "hr_background.bin");                    
 155     }                                                                                                    
 156                                                                                                          
 157     private void loadBackground() {                                                                      
 158         try {                                                                                            
 159             FileInputStream fis = new FileInputStream(getBackgroundFile());                              
 160             int count = fis.available();                                                                 
 161             if (count != 14400) {                                                                        
 162                 throw new RuntimeException("wrong background file length");                              
 163             }                                                                                            
 164             byte[] file = new byte[14400];                                                               
 165             fis.read(file);                                                                              
 166             fis.close();                                                                                 
 167             this.backGroundImage = AssetImageFactory.createAssetImage(file, 0, 0, 0);                    
 168         } catch (FileNotFoundException e) {                                                              
 169             SharedPreferences preferences = getDeviceSpecificPreferences();                              
 170             if (preferences.getBoolean("force_white_color_scheme", false)) {                             
 171                 Bitmap whiteBitmap = Bitmap.createBitmap(239, 239, Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888);             
 172                 new Canvas(whiteBitmap).drawColor(Color.WHITE);                                          
 173                 try {                                                                                    
 174                     this.backGroundImage = AssetImageFactory.createAssetImage(whiteBitmap, true, 0, 1, 0)🔵
 175                     queueWrite(new AssetFilePutRequest(this.backGroundImage, ((byte) (0x0)), this));     
 176                 } catch (IOException e2) {                                                               
 177                     logger.error("Backgroundimage error", e2);                                           
 178                 }                                                                                        
 179             }                                                                                            
 180         } catch (IOException | java.lang.RuntimeException e) {                                           
 181             GB.log("error opening background file", GB.ERROR, e);                                        
 182             GB.toast("error opening background file", Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.ERROR);                      
 183         }                                                                                                
 184     }                                                                                                    
 185                                                                                                          
 186     @Override                                                                                            
 187     public void setBackgroundImage(byte[] pixels) {                                                      
 188         if (pixels == null) {                                                                            
 189             getBackgroundFile().delete();                                                                
 190             this.backGroundImage = null;                                                                 
 191         } else {                                                                                         
 192             this.backGroundImage = AssetImageFactory.createAssetImage(pixels, 0, 0, 0);                  
 193             try {                                                                                        
 194                 FileOutputStream fos = new FileOutputStream(getBackgroundFile(), false);                 
 195                 fos.write(pixels);                                                                       
 196             } catch (IOException e) {                                                                    
 197                 GB.log("error saving background", GB.ERROR, e);                                          
 198                 GB.toast("error persistent saving background", Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.ERROR);             
 199             }                                                                                            
 200         }                                                                                                
 201         renderWidgets();                                                                                 
 202     }

 204     private void loadWidgets() {                                                                         
 205         Prefs prefs = new Prefs(GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(getDeviceSupport().getDevice()🔵
 206         boolean forceWhiteBackground = prefs.getBoolean("force_white_color_scheme", false);              
 207         String fontColor = (forceWhiteBackground) ? "black" : "default";                                 
 208         this.widgets.clear();                                                                            
 209         String widgetJson = GBApplication.getPrefs().getPreferences().getString("FOSSIL_HR_WIDGETS", "{}"🔵
 210         String customWidgetJson = GBApplication.getPrefs().getString("QHYBRID_CUSTOM_WIDGETS", "[]");    
 211         try {                                                                                            
 212             JSONObject widgetConfig = new JSONObject(widgetJson);                                        
 213             JSONArray customWidgets = new JSONArray(customWidgetJson);                                   
 214             Iterator<String> keyIterator = widgetConfig.keys();                                          
 215             HashMap<String, Integer> positionMap = new HashMap<>(4);                                     
 216             positionMap.put("top", 0);                                                                   
 217             positionMap.put("right", 90);                                                                
 218             positionMap.put("bottom", 180);                                                              
 219             positionMap.put("left", 270);                                                                
 220             while (keyIterator.hasNext()) {                                                              
 221                 String position = keyIterator.next();                                                    
 222                 String identifier = widgetConfig.getString(position);                                    
 223                 Widget.WidgetType type = Widget.WidgetType.fromJsonIdentifier(identifier);               
 224                 Widget widget = null;                                                                    
 225                 if (type != null) {                                                                      
 226                     widget = new Widget(type, positionMap.get(position), 63, fontColor);                 
 227                 } else {                                                                                 
 228                     identifier = identifier.substring(7);                                                
 229                     for (int i = 0; i < customWidgets.length(); i++) {                                   
 230                         JSONObject customWidget = customWidgets.getJSONObject(i);                        
 231                         if (customWidget.getString("name").equals(identifier)) {                         
 232                             boolean drawCircle = false;                                                  
 233                             if (customWidget.has("drawCircle")) {                                        
 234                                 drawCircle = customWidget.getBoolean("drawCircle");                      
 235                             }                                                                            
 236                             CustomWidget newWidget = new CustomWidget(customWidget.getString("name"), pos🔵
 237                             JSONArray elements = customWidget.getJSONArray("elements");                  
 238                             for (int i2 = 0; i2 < elements.length(); i2++) {                             
 239                                 JSONObject element = elements.getJSONObject(i2);                         
 240                                 if (element.getString("type").equals("text")) {                          
 241                                     newWidget.addElement(new CustomTextWidgetElement(element.getString("i🔵
 242                                 } else if (element.getString("type").equals("background")) {             
 243                                     newWidget.addElement(new CustomBackgroundWidgetElement(element.getStr🔵
 244                                 }                                                                        
 245                             }                                                                            
 246                             widget = newWidget;                                                          
 247                         }                                                                                
 248                     }                                                                                    
 249                 }                                                                                        
 250                 if (widget == null) {                                                                    
 251                     continue;                                                                            
 252                 }                                                                                        
 253                 this.widgets.add(widget);                                                                
 254             }                                                                                            
 255         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 256             e.printStackTrace();                                                                         
 257         }                                                                                                
 258         uploadWidgets();                                                                                 
 259     }                                                                                                    
 260                                                                                                          
 261     private void uploadWidgets(){                                                                        
 262         negotiateSymmetricKey();                                                                         
 263         ArrayList<Widget> systemWidgets = new ArrayList<>(widgets.size());                               
 264         for(Widget widget : this.widgets){                                                               
 265             if(!(widget instanceof CustomWidget)) systemWidgets.add(widget);                             
 266         }                                                                                                
 267         queueWrite(new WidgetsPutRequest(systemWidgets.toArray(new Widget[0]), this));                   
 268     }

 270     private void renderWidgets() {                                                                       
 271         Prefs prefs = new Prefs(GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(getDeviceSupport().getDevice()🔵
 272         boolean forceWhiteBackground = prefs.getBoolean("force_white_color_scheme", false);              
 273         boolean drawCircles = prefs.getBoolean("widget_draw_circles", false);                            
 274         Bitmap circleBitmap = null;                                                                      
 275         if (drawCircles) {                                                                               
 276             circleBitmap = Bitmap.createBitmap(76, 76, Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888);                         
 277             Canvas circleCanvas = new Canvas(circleBitmap);                                              
 278             Paint circlePaint = new Paint();                                                             
 279             circlePaint.setColor(forceWhiteBackground ? Color.WHITE : Color.BLACK);                      
 280             circlePaint.setStyle(Paint.Style.FILL);                                                      
 281             circlePaint.setStrokeWidth(3);                                                               
 282             circleCanvas.drawCircle(38, 38, 37, circlePaint);                                            
 283             circlePaint.setColor(forceWhiteBackground ? Color.BLACK : Color.WHITE);                      
 284             circlePaint.setStyle(Paint.Style.STROKE);                                                    
 285             circlePaint.setStrokeWidth(3);                                                               
 286             circleCanvas.drawCircle(38, 38, 37, circlePaint);                                            
 287         }                                                                                                
 288         try {                                                                                            
 289             ArrayList<AssetImage> widgetImages = new ArrayList<>();                                      
 290             for (int i = 0; i < this.widgets.size(); i++) {                                              
 291                 Widget w = widgets.get(i);                                                               
 292                 if (!(w instanceof CustomWidget)) {                                                      
 293                     if (drawCircles) {                                                                   
 294                         widgetImages.add(AssetImageFactory.createAssetImage(circleBitmap, true, w.getAngl🔵
 295                     }                                                                                    
 296                     continue;                                                                            
 297                 }                                                                                        
 298                 CustomWidget widget = ((CustomWidget) (w));                                              
 299                 Bitmap widgetBitmap = Bitmap.createBitmap(76, 76, Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888);              
 300                 Canvas widgetCanvas = new Canvas(widgetBitmap);                                          
 301                 if (drawCircles) {                                                                       
 302                     widgetCanvas.drawBitmap(circleBitmap, 0, 0, null);                                   
 303                 }                                                                                        
 304                 for (CustomWidgetElement element : widget.getElements()) {                               
 305                     if (element.getWidgetElementType() == CustomWidgetElement.WidgetElementType.TYPE_BACK🔵
 306                         File imageFile = new File(element.getValue());                                   
 307                         if ((!imageFile.exists()) || (!imageFile.isFile())) {                            
 308                             logger.debug(("Image file " + element.getValue()) + " not found");           
 309                             continue;                                                                    
 310                         }                                                                                
 311                         Bitmap imageBitmap = BitmapFactory.decodeFile(element.getValue());               
 312                         if (imageBitmap == null) {                                                       
 313                             logger.debug(("image file " + element.getValue()) + " could not be decoded");
 314                             continue;                                                                    
 315                         }                                                                                
 316                         Bitmap scaledBitmap = Bitmap.createScaledBitmap(imageBitmap, 76, 76, false);     
 317                         widgetCanvas.drawBitmap(scaledBitmap, 0, 0, null);                               
 318                         break;                                                                           
 319                     }                                                                                    
 320                 }                                                                                        
 321                 for (CustomWidgetElement element : widget.getElements()) {                               
 322                     if (element.getWidgetElementType() == CustomWidgetElement.WidgetElementType.TYPE_TEXT🔵
 323                         Paint textPaint = new Paint();                                                   
 324                         textPaint.setStrokeWidth(4);                                                     
 325                         textPaint.setTextSize(17.0F);                                                    
 326                         textPaint.setStyle(Paint.Style.FILL);                                            
 327                         textPaint.setColor(forceWhiteBackground ? Color.BLACK : Color.WHITE);            
 328                         textPaint.setTextAlign(Paint.Align.CENTER);                                      
 329                         widgetCanvas.drawText(element.getValue(), element.getX(), element.getY() - ((text🔵
 330                     } else if (element.getWidgetElementType() == CustomWidgetElement.WidgetElementType.TY🔵
 331                         Bitmap imageBitmap = BitmapFactory.decodeFile(element.getValue());               
 332                         widgetCanvas.drawBitmap(imageBitmap, element.getX() - (imageBitmap.getWidth() / 2🔵
 333                     }                                                                                    
 334                 }                                                                                        
 335                 widgetImages.add(AssetImageFactory.createAssetImage(widgetBitmap, true, widget.getAngle()🔵
 336             }                                                                                            
 337             if (this.backGroundImage != null) {                                                          
 338                 widgetImages.add(this.backGroundImage);                                                  
 339             }                                                                                            
 340             queueWrite(new AssetFilePutRequest(widgetImages.toArray(new AssetImage[0]), ((byte) (0x0)), t🔵
 341             // queueWrite(new FileDeleteRequest((short) 0x0503));                                        
 342             queueWrite(new ImagesSetRequest(widgetImages.toArray(new AssetImage[0]), this));             
 343         } catch (IOException e) {                                                                        
 344             e.printStackTrace();                                                                         
 345         }                                                                                                
 346     }

 348     @Override                                                                                            
 349     public void setWidgetContent(String widgetID, String content, boolean renderOnWatch) {               
 350         boolean update = false;                                                                          
 351         for (Widget widget : this.widgets) {                                                             
 352             if(!(widget instanceof CustomWidget)) continue;                                              
 353             if(((CustomWidget) widget).updateElementValue(widgetID, content)) update = true;             
 354         }                                                                                                
 355                                                                                                          
 356         if (renderOnWatch && update) renderWidgets();                                                    
 357     }

 359     private void negotiateSymmetricKey() {                                                               
 360         queueWrite(new VerifyPrivateKeyRequest(                                                          
 361                 this.getSecretKey(),                                                                     
 362                 this                                                                                     
 363         ));                                                                                              
 364     }

 366     @Override                                                                                            
 367     public void setTime() {                                                                              
 368         negotiateSymmetricKey();                                                                         
 369                                                                                                          
 370         long millis = System.currentTimeMillis();                                                        
 371         TimeZone zone = new GregorianCalendar().getTimeZone();                                           
 372                                                                                                          
 373         queueWrite(                                                                                      
 374                 new ConfigurationPutRequest(                                                             
 375                         new TimeConfigItem(                                                              
 376                                 (int) (millis / 1000 + getDeviceSupport().getTimeOffset() * 60),         
 377                                 (short) (millis % 1000),                                                 
 378                                 (short) (zone.getOffset(millis) / 60000)                                 
 379                         ),                                                                               
 380                         this), false                                                                     
 381         );                                                                                               
 382     }

 384     @Override                                                                                            
 385     public void setMusicInfo(MusicSpec musicSpec) {                                                      
 386         if (                                                                                             
 387                 currentSpec != null                                                                      
 388                         && currentSpec.album.equals(musicSpec.album)                                     
 389                         && currentSpec.artist.equals(musicSpec.artist)                                   
 390                         && currentSpec.track.equals(musicSpec.track)                                     
 391         ) return;                                                                                        
 392         currentSpec = musicSpec;                                                                         
 393         try {                                                                                            
 394             queueWrite(new MusicInfoSetRequest(                                                          
 395                     musicSpec.artist,                                                                    
 396                     musicSpec.album,                                                                     
 397                     musicSpec.track,                                                                     
 398                     this                                                                                 
 399             ));                                                                                          
 400         }catch (BufferOverflowException e){                                                              
 401             GB.log("musicInfo: " + musicSpec, GB.ERROR, e);                                              
 402         }                                                                                                
 403     }

 436     public boolean playRawNotification(NotificationSpec notificationSpec) {                              
 437         String senderOrTitle = StringUtils.getFirstOf(notificationSpec.sender, notificationSpec.title);  
 438                                                                                                          
 439         try {                                                                                            
 440             for (NotificationHRConfiguration configuration : this.notificationConfigurations){           
 441                 if(configuration.getPackageName().equals(notificationSpec.sourceAppId)){                 
 442                     queueWrite(new PlayTextNotificationRequest(notificationSpec.sourceAppId, senderOrTitl🔵
 443                     return true;                                                                         
 444                 }                                                                                        
 445             }                                                                                            
 446             queueWrite(new PlayTextNotificationRequest("generic", senderOrTitle, notificationSpec.body, t🔵
 447         }catch (Exception e){                                                                            
 448             e.printStackTrace();                                                                         
 449         }                                                                                                
 450         return true;                                                                                     
 451     }
