 478     // this method is based on the one from AppMessageHandlerYWeather.java                               
 479     private int getIconForConditionCode(int conditionCode, boolean isNight) {                            
 480         final int CLEAR_DAY = 0;                                                                         
 481         final int CLEAR_NIGHT = 1;                                                                       
 482         final int CLOUDY = 2;                                                                            
 483         final int PARTLY_CLOUDY_DAY = 3;                                                                 
 484         final int PARTLY_CLOUDY_NIGHT = 4;                                                               
 485         final int RAIN = 5;                                                                              
 486         final int SNOW = 6;                                                                              
 487         final int SNOW_2 = 7; // same as 6?                                                              
 488         final int THUNDERSTORM = 8;                                                                      
 489         final int CLOUDY_2 = 9; // same as 2?                                                            
 490         final int WINDY = 10;                                                                            
 491                                                                                                          
 492         if (conditionCode == 800 || conditionCode == 951) {                                              
 493             return isNight ? CLEAR_NIGHT : CLEAR_DAY;                                                    
 494         } else if (conditionCode > 800 && conditionCode < 900) {                                         
 495             return isNight ? PARTLY_CLOUDY_NIGHT : PARTLY_CLOUDY_DAY;                                    
 496         } else if (conditionCode >= 300 && conditionCode < 400) {                                        
 497             return RAIN; // drizzle mapped to rain                                                       
 498         } else if (conditionCode >= 500 && conditionCode < 600) {                                        
 499             return RAIN;                                                                                 
 500         } else if (conditionCode >= 700 && conditionCode < 732) {                                        
 501             return CLOUDY;                                                                               
 502         } else if (conditionCode == 741 || conditionCode == 751 || conditionCode == 761 || conditionCode 🔵
 503             return CLOUDY; // fog mapped to cloudy                                                       
 504         } else if (conditionCode == 771) {                                                               
 505             return CLOUDY; // squalls mapped to cloudy                                                   
 506         } else if (conditionCode == 781) {                                                               
 507             return WINDY; // tornato mapped to windy                                                     
 508         } else if (conditionCode >= 200 && conditionCode < 300) {                                        
 509             return THUNDERSTORM;                                                                         
 510         } else if (conditionCode >= 600 && conditionCode <= 602) {                                       
 511             return SNOW;                                                                                 
 512         } else if (conditionCode >= 611 && conditionCode <= 622) {                                       
 513             return RAIN;                                                                                 
 514         } else if (conditionCode == 906) {                                                               
 515             return RAIN; // hail mapped to rain                                                          
 516         } else if (conditionCode >= 907 && conditionCode < 957) {                                        
 517             return WINDY;                                                                                
 518         } else if (conditionCode == 905) {                                                               
 519             return WINDY;                                                                                
 520         } else if (conditionCode == 900) {                                                               
 521             return WINDY;                                                                                
 522         } else if (conditionCode == 901 || conditionCode == 902 || conditionCode == 962) {               
 523             return WINDY;                                                                                
 524         }                                                                                                
 525         return isNight ? CLEAR_NIGHT : CLEAR_DAY;                                                        
 526     }                                                                                                    
 527                                                                                                          
 528     @Override                                                                                            
 529     public void onSendWeather(WeatherSpec weatherSpec) {                                                 
 530         long ts = System.currentTimeMillis();                                                            
 531         ts /= 1000;                                                                                      
 532         try {                                                                                            
 533             JSONObject responseObject = new JSONObject()                                                 
 534                     .put("res", new JSONObject()                                                         
 535                             .put("id", 0) // seems the id does not matter?                               
 536                             .put("set", new JSONObject()                                                 
 537                                     .put("weatherInfo", new JSONObject()                                 
 538                                             .put("alive", ts + 60 * 60)                                  
 539                                             .put("unit", "c") // FIXME: do not hardcode                  
 540                                             .put("temp", weatherSpec.currentTemp - 273)                  
 541                                             .put("cond_id", getIconForConditionCode(weatherSpec.currentCo🔵
 542                                     )                                                                    
 543                             )                                                                            
 544                     );                                                                                   
 545                                                                                                          
 546             queueWrite(new JsonPutRequest(responseObject, this));                                        
 547                                                                                                          
 548             JSONArray forecastWeekArray = new JSONArray();                                               
 549             final String[] weekdays = {"", "Sun", "Mon", "Tue", "Wed", "Thu", "Fri", "Sat"};             
 550             Calendar cal = Calendar.getInstance();                                                       
 551             cal.setTimeInMillis(weatherSpec.timestamp * 1000L);                                          
 552             int i = 0;                                                                                   
 553             for (WeatherSpec.Forecast forecast : weatherSpec.forecasts) {                                
 554                 cal.add(Calendar.DATE, 1);                                                               
 555                 int dayOfWeek = cal.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_WEEK);                                           
 556                 forecastWeekArray.put(new JSONObject()                                                   
 557                         .put("day", weekdays[dayOfWeek])                                                 
 558                         .put("cond_id", getIconForConditionCode(forecast.conditionCode, false)) // FIXME 🔵
 559                         .put("high", forecast.maxTemp - 273)                                             
 560                         .put("low", forecast.minTemp - 273)                                              
 561                 );                                                                                       
 562                 if (++i == 3) break; // max 3                                                            
 563             }                                                                                            
 564                                                                                                          
 565             JSONArray forecastDayArray = new JSONArray();                                                
 566             final int[] hours = {0, 0, 0};                                                               
 567                                                                                                          
 568             for (int hour : hours) {                                                                     
 569                 forecastDayArray.put(new JSONObject()                                                    
 570                         .put("hour", hour)                                                               
 571                         .put("cond_id", 0)                                                               
 572                         .put("temp", 0)                                                                  
 573                 );                                                                                       
 574             }                                                                                            
 575                                                                                                          
 576                                                                                                          
 577             JSONObject forecastResponseObject = new JSONObject()                                         
 578                     .put("res", new JSONObject()                                                         
 579                             .put("id", 0)                                                                
 580                             .put("set", new JSONObject()                                                 
 581                                     .put("weatherApp._.config.locations", new JSONArray()                
 582                                             .put(new JSONObject()                                        
 583                                                     .put("alive", ts + 60 * 60)                          
 584                                                     .put("city", weatherSpec.location)                   
 585                                                     .put("unit", "c") // FIXME: do not hardcode          
 586                                                     .put("temp", weatherSpec.currentTemp - 273)          
 587                                                     .put("high", weatherSpec.todayMaxTemp - 273)         
 588                                                     .put("low", weatherSpec.todayMinTemp - 273)          
 589                                                     .put("rain", 0)                                      
 590                                                     .put("cond_id", getIconForConditionCode(weatherSpec.c🔵
 591                                                     .put("forecast_day", forecastDayArray)               
 592                                                     .put("forecast_week", forecastWeekArray)             
 593                                             )                                                            
 594                                     )                                                                    
 595                             )                                                                            
 596                     );                                                                                   
 597                                                                                                          
 598             queueWrite(new JsonPutRequest(forecastResponseObject, this));                                
 599                                                                                                          
 600         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 601             logger.error("JSON exception: ", e);                                                         
 602         }                                                                                                
 603     }

 633     public byte[] getSecretKey() {                                                                       
 634         byte[] authKeyBytes = new byte[16];                                                              
 635                                                                                                          
 636         SharedPreferences sharedPrefs = GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(getDeviceSupport().get🔵
 637                                                                                                          
 638         String authKey = sharedPrefs.getString("authkey", null);                                         
 639         if (authKey != null && !authKey.isEmpty()) {                                                     
 640             byte[] srcBytes = authKey.trim().getBytes();                                                 
 641             if (authKey.length() == 34 && authKey.startsWith("0x")) {                                    
 642                 srcBytes = GB.hexStringToByteArray(authKey.substring(2));                                
 643             }                                                                                            
 644             System.arraycopy(srcBytes, 0, authKeyBytes, 0, Math.min(srcBytes.length, 16));               
 645         }                                                                                                
 646                                                                                                          
 647         return authKeyBytes;                                                                             
 648     }

 705     @Override                                                                                            
 706     public void handleHeartRateCharacteristic(BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic) {              
 707         super.handleHeartRateCharacteristic(characteristic);                                             
 708                                                                                                          
 709         byte[] value = characteristic.getValue();                                                        
 710                                                                                                          
 711         int heartRate = value[1];                                                                        
 712                                                                                                          
 713         logger.debug("heart rate: " + heartRate);                                                        
 714     }

 716     @Override                                                                                            
 717     protected void handleBackgroundCharacteristic(BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic) {          
 718         super.handleBackgroundCharacteristic(characteristic);                                            
 719                                                                                                          
 720         byte[] value = characteristic.getValue();                                                        
 721                                                                                                          
 722         byte requestType = value[1];                                                                     
 723                                                                                                          
 724         if(requestType == (byte) 0x04){                                                                  
 725             handleCallRequest(value);                                                                    
 726         }else if (requestType == (byte) 0x05) {                                                          
 727             handleMusicRequest(value);                                                                   
 728         } else if (requestType == (byte) 0x01) {                                                         
 729             int eventId = value[2];                                                                      
 730             logger.info("got event id " + eventId);                                                      
 731             try {                                                                                        
 732                 String jsonString = new String(value, 3, value.length - 3);                              
 733                 logger.info(jsonString);                                                                 
 734                 JSONObject requestJson = new JSONObject(jsonString);                                     
 735                                                                                                          
 736                 JSONObject request = requestJson.getJSONObject("req");                                   
 737                 int requestId = request.getInt("id");                                                    
 738                                                                                                          
 739                 if (request.has("ringMyPhone")) {                                                        
 740                     String action = request.getJSONObject("ringMyPhone").getString("action");            
 741                     logger.info("got ringMyPhone request; " + action);                                   
 742                     GBDeviceEventFindPhone findPhoneEvent = new GBDeviceEventFindPhone();                
 743                                                                                                          
 744                     JSONObject responseObject = new JSONObject()                                         
 745                             .put("res", new JSONObject()                                                 
 746                                     .put("id", requestId)                                                
 747                                     .put("set", new JSONObject()                                         
 748                                             .put("ringMyPhone", new JSONObject()                         
 749                                             )                                                            
 750                                     )                                                                    
 751                             );                                                                           
 752                                                                                                          
 753                     if ("on".equals(action)) {                                                           
 754                         findPhoneEvent.event = GBDeviceEventFindPhone.Event.START;                       
 755                         getDeviceSupport().evaluateGBDeviceEvent(findPhoneEvent);                        
 756                         responseObject                                                                   
 757                                 .getJSONObject("res")                                                    
 758                                 .getJSONObject("set")                                                    
 759                                 .getJSONObject("ringMyPhone")                                            
 760                                 .put("result", "on");                                                    
 761                         queueWrite(new JsonPutRequest(responseObject, this));                            
 762                     } else if ("off".equals(action)) {                                                   
 763                         findPhoneEvent.event = GBDeviceEventFindPhone.Event.STOP;                        
 764                         getDeviceSupport().evaluateGBDeviceEvent(findPhoneEvent);                        
 765                         responseObject                                                                   
 766                                 .getJSONObject("res")                                                    
 767                                 .getJSONObject("set")                                                    
 768                                 .getJSONObject("ringMyPhone")                                            
 769                                 .put("result", "off");                                                   
 770                         queueWrite(new JsonPutRequest(responseObject, this));                            
 771                     }                                                                                    
 772                 } else if (request.has("weatherInfo") || request.has("weatherApp._.config.locations")) { 
 773                     logger.info("Got weatherInfo request");                                              
 774                     WeatherSpec weatherSpec = Weather.getInstance().getWeatherSpec();                    
 775                     if (weatherSpec != null) {                                                           
 776                         onSendWeather(weatherSpec);                                                      
 777                     } else {                                                                             
 778                         logger.info("no weather data available  - ignoring request");                    
 779                     }                                                                                    
 780                 } else if (request.has("commuteApp._.config.commute_info")) {                            
 781                     String action = request.getJSONObject("commuteApp._.config.commute_info")            
 782                             .getString("dest");                                                          
 783                                                                                                          
 784                     String startStop = request.getJSONObject("commuteApp._.config.commute_info")         
 785                             .getString("action");                                                        
 786                                                                                                          
 787                     if (startStop.equals("stop")) {                                                      
 788                         // overwriteButtons(null);                                                       
 789                         return;                                                                          
 790                     }                                                                                    
 791                                                                                                          
 792                     queueWrite(new SetCommuteMenuMessage("Anfrage wird weitergeleitet...", false, this));
 793                                                                                                          
 794                     Intent menuIntent = new Intent(QHybridSupport.QHYBRID_EVENT_COMMUTE_MENU);           
 795                     menuIntent.putExtra("EXTRA_ACTION", action);                                         
 796                     getContext().sendBroadcast(menuIntent);                                              
 797                 } else {                                                                                 
 798                     logger.warn("Unhandled request from watch: " + requestJson.toString());              
 799                 }                                                                                        
 800             } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                  
 801                 e.printStackTrace();                                                                     
 802             }                                                                                            
 803         }                                                                                                
 804     }                                                                                                    
 805                                                                                                          
 806     private void handleCallRequest(byte[] value) {                                                       
 807         boolean acceptCall = value[7] == (byte) 0x00;                                                    
 808         queueWrite(new PlayCallNotificationRequest("", false, this));                                    
 809                                                                                                          
 810         GBDeviceEventCallControl callControlEvent = new GBDeviceEventCallControl();                      
 811         callControlEvent.event = acceptCall ? GBDeviceEventCallControl.Event.START : GBDeviceEventCallCon🔵
 812                                                                                                          
 813         getDeviceSupport().evaluateGBDeviceEvent(callControlEvent);                                      
 814     }                                                                                                    
 815                                                                                                          
 816     private void handleMusicRequest(byte[] value) {                                                      
 817         byte command = value[3];                                                                         
 818         logger.info("got music command: " + command);                                                    
 819         MUSIC_WATCH_REQUEST request = MUSIC_WATCH_REQUEST.fromCommandByte(command);                      
 820                                                                                                          
 821         GBDeviceEventMusicControl deviceEventMusicControl = new GBDeviceEventMusicControl();             
 822         deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.PLAY;                            
 823                                                                                                          
 824         // TODO add skipping/seeking                                                                     
 825                                                                                                          
 826         switch (request) {                                                                               
 827             case MUSIC_REQUEST_PLAY_PAUSE: {                                                             
 828                 queueWrite(new MusicControlRequest(MUSIC_PHONE_REQUEST.MUSIC_REQUEST_PLAY_PAUSE));       
 829                 deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.PLAYPAUSE;               
 830                 break;                                                                                   
 831             }                                                                                            
 832             case MUSIC_REQUEST_NEXT: {                                                                   
 833                 queueWrite(new MusicControlRequest(MUSIC_PHONE_REQUEST.MUSIC_REQUEST_NEXT));             
 834                 deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.NEXT;                    
 835                 break;                                                                                   
 836             }                                                                                            
 837             case MUSIC_REQUEST_PREVIOUS: {                                                               
 838                 queueWrite(new MusicControlRequest(MUSIC_PHONE_REQUEST.MUSIC_REQUEST_PREVIOUS));         
 839                 deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.PREVIOUS;                
 840                 break;                                                                                   
 841             }                                                                                            
 842             case MUSIC_REQUEST_LOUDER: {                                                                 
 843                 queueWrite(new MusicControlRequest(MUSIC_PHONE_REQUEST.MUSIC_REQUEST_LOUDER));           
 844                 deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.VOLUMEUP;                
 845                 break;                                                                                   
 846             }                                                                                            
 847             case MUSIC_REQUEST_QUITER: {                                                                 
 848                 queueWrite(new MusicControlRequest(MUSIC_PHONE_REQUEST.MUSIC_REQUEST_QUITER));           
 849                 deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.VOLUMEDOWN;              
 850                 break;                                                                                   
 851             }                                                                                            
 852         }                                                                                                
 853                                                                                                          
 854         getDeviceSupport().evaluateGBDeviceEvent(deviceEventMusicControl);                               
 855     }                                                                                                    
 856                                                                                                          
 857     @Override                                                                                            
 858     public void setCommuteMenuMessage(String message, boolean finished) {                                
 859         queueWrite(new SetCommuteMenuMessage(message, finished, this));                                  
 860     }

 863         return jsonIndex++;                                                                              
 864     }

 101      @Override                                                                                                     
 102      public void initialize() {                                                                                    
 103          if (Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= Build.VERSION_CODES.LOLLIPOP) {                                              
 104              queueWrite(new RequestMtuRequest(512));                                                               
 105          }                                                                                                         
 106                                                                                                                    
 107          queueWrite(new SetDeviceStateRequest(GBDevice.State.AUTHENTICATING));                                     
 108                                                                                                                    
 109          negotiateSymmetricKey();                                                                                  
 110                                                                                                                    
 111          queueWrite(new SetDeviceStateRequest(GBDevice.State.INITIALIZING));                                       
 112                                                                                                                    
 113          loadNotificationConfigurations();                                                                         
 114          queueWrite(new NotificationFilterPutHRRequest(this.notificationConfigurations, this));                    
 115          setVibrationStrength();                                                                                   
 116                                                                                                                    
 117          syncSettings();                                                                                           
 118                                                                                                                    
 119          setTime();                                                                                                
 120                                                                                                                    
 121          overwriteButtons(null);                                                                                   
 122                                                                                                                    
 123                                                                                                                    
 124          loadBackground();                                                                                         
 125          loadWidgets();                                                                                            
 126          // renderWidgets();                                                                                       
 127          // dunno if there is any point in doing this at start since when no watch is connected the QHybridSupport 🔵
 128                                                                                                                    
 129          queueWrite(new SetDeviceStateRequest(GBDevice.State.INITIALIZED));                                        
 130      }

 132      private void setVibrationStrength() {                                                                         
 133          Prefs prefs = new Prefs(getDeviceSpecificPreferences());                                                  
 134          int vibrationStrengh = prefs.getInt(DeviceSettingsPreferenceConst.PREF_VIBRATION_STRENGH_PERCENTAGE, 2);  
 135          if (vibrationStrengh > 0) {                                                                               
 136              vibrationStrengh = (vibrationStrengh + 1) * 25; // Seems 0,50,75,100 are working...                   
 137          }                                                                                                         
 138          setVibrationStrength((short) (vibrationStrengh));                                                         
 139      }

 216      private void loadWidgets() {                                                                                  
 217          Prefs prefs = new Prefs(GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(getDeviceSupport().getDevice().getAddre🔵
 218          boolean forceWhiteBackground = prefs.getBoolean("force_white_color_scheme", false);                       
 219          String fontColor = forceWhiteBackground ? "black" : "default";                                            
 220                                                                                                                    
 221          this.widgets.clear();                                                                                     
 222          String widgetJson = GBApplication.getPrefs().getPreferences().getString("FOSSIL_HR_WIDGETS", "{}");       
 223          String customWidgetJson = GBApplication.getPrefs().getString("QHYBRID_CUSTOM_WIDGETS", "[]");             
 224                                                                                                                    
 225          try {                                                                                                     
 226              JSONObject widgetConfig = new JSONObject(widgetJson);                                                 
 227              JSONArray customWidgets = new JSONArray(customWidgetJson);                                            
 228                                                                                                                    
 229              Iterator<String> keyIterator = widgetConfig.keys();                                                   
 230              HashMap<String, Integer> positionMap = new HashMap<>(4);                                              
 231              positionMap.put("top", 0);                                                                            
 232              positionMap.put("right", 90);                                                                         
 233              positionMap.put("bottom", 180);                                                                       
 234              positionMap.put("left", 270);                                                                         
 235                                                                                                                    
 236              while(keyIterator.hasNext()){                                                                         
 237                  String position = keyIterator.next();                                                             
 238                  String identifier = widgetConfig.getString(position);                                             
 239                  Widget.WidgetType type = Widget.WidgetType.fromJsonIdentifier(identifier);                        
 240                                                                                                                    
 241                  Widget widget = null;                                                                             
 242                  if(type != null) {                                                                                
 243                      widget = new Widget(type, positionMap.get(position), 63, fontColor);                          
 244                  }else{                                                                                            
 245                      identifier = identifier.substring(7);                                                         
 246                      for(int i = 0; i < customWidgets.length(); i++){                                              
 247                          JSONObject customWidget = customWidgets.getJSONObject(i);                                 
 248                          if(customWidget.getString("name").equals(identifier)){                                    
 249                              boolean drawCircle = false;                                                           
 250                              if(customWidget.has("drawCircle")) drawCircle = customWidget.getBoolean("drawCircle");
 251                              CustomWidget newWidget = new CustomWidget(                                            
 252                                      customWidget.getString("name"),                                               
 253                                      positionMap.get(position),                                                    
 254                                      63,                                                                           
 255                                      fontColor,                                                                    
 256                                      drawCircle                                                                    

 257                              );                                                                                    
 258                              JSONArray elements = customWidget.getJSONArray("elements");                           
 259                                                                                                                    
 260                              for (int i2 = 0; i2 < elements.length(); i2++) {                                      
 261                                  JSONObject element = elements.getJSONObject(i2);                                  
 262                                  if (element.getString("type").equals("text")) {                                   
 263                                      newWidget.addElement(new CustomTextWidgetElement(                             
 264                                              element.getString("id"),                                              
 265                                              element.getString("value"),                                           
 266                                              element.getInt("x"),                                                  
 267                                              element.getInt("y")                                                   
 268                                      ));                                                                           
 269                                  } else if (element.getString("type").equals("background")) {                      
 270                                      newWidget.addElement(new CustomBackgroundWidgetElement(                       
 271                                              element.getString("id"),                                              
 272                                              element.getString("value")                                            
 273                                      ));                                                                           
 274                                  }                                                                                 
 275                              }                                                                                     
 276                              widget = newWidget;                                                                   
 277                          }                                                                                         
 278                      }                                                                                             
 279                  }                                                                                                 
 280                                                                                                                    
 281                  if(widget == null) continue;                                                                      
 282                  this.widgets.add(widget);                                                                         
 283              }                                                                                                     
 284          } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                               
 285              e.printStackTrace();                                                                                  
 286          }                                                                                                         
 287                                                                                                                    
 288          uploadWidgets();                                                                                          
 289      }

 291      private void uploadWidgets(){                                                                                 
 292          negotiateSymmetricKey();                                                                                  
 293          ArrayList<Widget> systemWidgets = new ArrayList<>(widgets.size());                                        
 294          for(Widget widget : this.widgets){                                                                        
 295              if(!(widget instanceof CustomWidget)) systemWidgets.add(widget);                                      
 296          }                                                                                                         
 297          queueWrite(new WidgetsPutRequest(systemWidgets.toArray(new Widget[0]), this));                            
 298      }

 411      @Override                                                                                                     
 412      public void setWidgetContent(String widgetID, String content, boolean renderOnWatch) {                        
 413          boolean update = false;                                                                                   
 414          for (Widget widget : this.widgets) {                                                                      
 415              if(!(widget instanceof CustomWidget)) continue;                                                       
 416              if(((CustomWidget) widget).updateElementValue(widgetID, content)) update = true;                      
 417          }                                                                                                         
 418                                                                                                                    
 419          if (renderOnWatch && update) renderWidgets();                                                             
 420      }

 422      private void negotiateSymmetricKey() {                                                                        
 423          queueWrite(new VerifyPrivateKeyRequest(                                                                   
 424                  this.getSecretKey(),                                                                              
 425                  this                                                                                              
 426          ));                                                                                                       
 427      }

 429      @Override                                                                                                     
 430      public void setTime() {                                                                                       
 431          negotiateSymmetricKey();                                                                                  
 432                                                                                                                    
 433          long millis = System.currentTimeMillis();                                                                 
 434          TimeZone zone = new GregorianCalendar().getTimeZone();                                                    
 435                                                                                                                    
 436          queueWrite(                                                                                               
 437                  new ConfigurationPutRequest(                                                                      
 438                          new TimeConfigItem(                                                                       
 439                                  (int) (millis / 1000 + getDeviceSupport().getTimeOffset() * 60),                  
 440                                  (short) (millis % 1000),                                                          
 441                                  (short) (zone.getOffset(millis) / 60000)                                          
 442                          ),                                                                                        
 443                          this), false                                                                              
 444          );                                                                                                        
 445      }

 447      @Override                                                                                                     
 448      public void setMusicInfo(MusicSpec musicSpec) {                                                               
 449          if (                                                                                                      
 450                  currentSpec != null                                                                               
 451                          && currentSpec.album.equals(musicSpec.album)                                              
 452                          && currentSpec.artist.equals(musicSpec.artist)                                            
 453                          && currentSpec.track.equals(musicSpec.track)                                              
 454          ) return;                                                                                                 
 455          currentSpec = musicSpec;                                                                                  
 456          try {                                                                                                     
 457              queueWrite(new MusicInfoSetRequest(                                                                   
 458                      musicSpec.artist,                                                                             
 459                      musicSpec.album,                                                                              
 460                      musicSpec.track,                                                                              
 461                      this                                                                                          
 462              ));                                                                                                   
 463          }catch (BufferOverflowException e){                                                                       
 464              GB.log("musicInfo: " + musicSpec, GB.ERROR, e);                                                       
 465          }                                                                                                         
 466      }

 499      public boolean playRawNotification(NotificationSpec notificationSpec) {                                       
 500          String senderOrTitle = StringUtils.getFirstOf(notificationSpec.sender, notificationSpec.title);           
 501                                                                                                                    
 502          try {                                                                                                     
 503              for (NotificationHRConfiguration configuration : this.notificationConfigurations){                    
 504                  if(configuration.getPackageName().equals(notificationSpec.sourceAppId)){                          
 505                      queueWrite(new PlayTextNotificationRequest(notificationSpec.sourceAppId, senderOrTitle, notifi🔵
 506                      return true;                                                                                  
 507                  }                                                                                                 
 508              }                                                                                                     
 509              queueWrite(new PlayTextNotificationRequest("generic", senderOrTitle, notificationSpec.body, this));   
 510          }catch (Exception e){                                                                                     
 511              e.printStackTrace();                                                                                  
 512          }                                                                                                         
 513          return true;                                                                                              
 514      }

 541      // this method is based on the one from AppMessageHandlerYWeather.java                                        
 542      private int getIconForConditionCode(int conditionCode, boolean isNight) {                                     
 543          final int CLEAR_DAY = 0;                                                                                  
 544          final int CLEAR_NIGHT = 1;                                                                                
 545          final int CLOUDY = 2;                                                                                     
 546          final int PARTLY_CLOUDY_DAY = 3;                                                                          
 547          final int PARTLY_CLOUDY_NIGHT = 4;                                                                        
 548          final int RAIN = 5;                                                                                       
 549          final int SNOW = 6;                                                                                       
 550          final int SNOW_2 = 7; // same as 6?                                                                       
 551          final int THUNDERSTORM = 8;                                                                               
 552          final int CLOUDY_2 = 9; // same as 2?                                                                     
 553          final int WINDY = 10;                                                                                     
 554                                                                                                                    
 555          if (conditionCode == 800 || conditionCode == 951) {                                                       
 556              return isNight ? CLEAR_NIGHT : CLEAR_DAY;                                                             
 557          } else if (conditionCode > 800 && conditionCode < 900) {                                                  
 558              return isNight ? PARTLY_CLOUDY_NIGHT : PARTLY_CLOUDY_DAY;                                             
 559          } else if (conditionCode >= 300 && conditionCode < 400) {                                                 
 560              return RAIN; // drizzle mapped to rain                                                                
 561          } else if (conditionCode >= 500 && conditionCode < 600) {                                                 
 562              return RAIN;                                                                                          
 563          } else if (conditionCode >= 700 && conditionCode < 732) {                                                 
 564              return CLOUDY;                                                                                        
 565          } else if (conditionCode == 741 || conditionCode == 751 || conditionCode == 761 || conditionCode == 762) {
 566              return CLOUDY; // fog mapped to cloudy                                                                
 567          } else if (conditionCode == 771) {                                                                        
 568              return CLOUDY; // squalls mapped to cloudy                                                            
 569          } else if (conditionCode == 781) {                                                                        
 570              return WINDY; // tornato mapped to windy                                                              
 571          } else if (conditionCode >= 200 && conditionCode < 300) {                                                 
 572              return THUNDERSTORM;                                                                                  
 573          } else if (conditionCode >= 600 && conditionCode <= 602) {                                                
 574              return SNOW;                                                                                          
 575          } else if (conditionCode >= 611 && conditionCode <= 622) {                                                
 576              return RAIN;                                                                                          
 577          } else if (conditionCode == 906) {                                                                        
 578              return RAIN; // hail mapped to rain                                                                   
 579          } else if (conditionCode >= 907 && conditionCode < 957) {                                                 
 580              return WINDY;                                                                                         
 581          } else if (conditionCode == 905) {                                                                        
 582              return WINDY;                                                                                         
 583          } else if (conditionCode == 900) {                                                                        
 584              return WINDY;                                                                                         
 585          } else if (conditionCode == 901 || conditionCode == 902 || conditionCode == 962) {                        
 586              return WINDY;                                                                                         
 587          }                                                                                                         
 588          return isNight ? CLEAR_NIGHT : CLEAR_DAY;                                                                 
 589      }                                                                                                             
 590                                                                                                                    
 591      @Override                                                                                                     
 592      public void onSendWeather(WeatherSpec weatherSpec) {                                                          
 593          long ts = System.currentTimeMillis();                                                                     
 594          ts /= 1000;                                                                                               
 595          try {                                                                                                     
 596              JSONObject responseObject = new JSONObject()                                                          
 597                      .put("res", new JSONObject()                                                                  
 598                              .put("id", 0) // seems the id does not matter?                                        
 599                              .put("set", new JSONObject()                                                          
 600                                      .put("weatherInfo", new JSONObject()                                          
 601                                              .put("alive", ts + 60 * 60)                                           
 602                                              .put("unit", "c") // FIXME: do not hardcode                           
 603                                              .put("temp", weatherSpec.currentTemp - 273)                           
 604                                              .put("cond_id", getIconForConditionCode(weatherSpec.currentConditionCo🔵
 605                                      )                                                                             
 606                              )                                                                                     
 607                      );                                                                                            
 608                                                                                                                    
 609              queueWrite(new JsonPutRequest(responseObject, this));                                                 
 610                                                                                                                    
 611              JSONArray forecastWeekArray = new JSONArray();                                                        
 612              final String[] weekdays = {"", "Sun", "Mon", "Tue", "Wed", "Thu", "Fri", "Sat"};                      
 613              Calendar cal = Calendar.getInstance();                                                                
 614              cal.setTimeInMillis(weatherSpec.timestamp * 1000L);                                                   
 615              int i = 0;                                                                                            
 616              for (WeatherSpec.Forecast forecast : weatherSpec.forecasts) {                                         
 617                  cal.add(Calendar.DATE, 1);                                                                        
 618                  int dayOfWeek = cal.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_WEEK);                                                    
 619                  forecastWeekArray.put(new JSONObject()                                                            
 620                          .put("day", weekdays[dayOfWeek])                                                          
 621                          .put("cond_id", getIconForConditionCode(forecast.conditionCode, false)) // FIXME do not as🔵
 622                          .put("high", forecast.maxTemp - 273)                                                      
 623                          .put("low", forecast.minTemp - 273)                                                       
 624                  );                                                                                                
 625                  if (++i == 3) break; // max 3                                                                     
 626              }                                                                                                     
 627                                                                                                                    
 628              JSONArray forecastDayArray = new JSONArray();                                                         
 629              final int[] hours = {0, 0, 0};                                                                        
 630                                                                                                                    
 631              for (int hour : hours) {                                                                              
 632                  forecastDayArray.put(new JSONObject()                                                             
 633                          .put("hour", hour)                                                                        
 634                          .put("cond_id", 0)                                                                        
 635                          .put("temp", 0)                                                                           
 636                  );                                                                                                
 637              }                                                                                                     
 638                                                                                                                    
 639                                                                                                                    
 640              JSONObject forecastResponseObject = new JSONObject()                                                  
 641                      .put("res", new JSONObject()                                                                  
 642                              .put("id", 0)                                                                         
 643                              .put("set", new JSONObject()                                                          
 644                                      .put("weatherApp._.config.locations", new JSONArray()                         
 645                                              .put(new JSONObject()                                                 
 646                                                      .put("alive", ts + 60 * 60)                                   
 647                                                      .put("city", weatherSpec.location)                            
 648                                                      .put("unit", "c") // FIXME: do not hardcode                   
 649                                                      .put("temp", weatherSpec.currentTemp - 273)                   
 650                                                      .put("high", weatherSpec.todayMaxTemp - 273)                  
 651                                                      .put("low", weatherSpec.todayMinTemp - 273)                   
 652                                                      .put("rain", 0)                                               
 653                                                      .put("cond_id", getIconForConditionCode(weatherSpec.currentCon🔵
 654                                                      .put("forecast_day", forecastDayArray)                        
 655                                                      .put("forecast_week", forecastWeekArray)                      
 656                                              )                                                                     
 657                                      )                                                                             
 658                              )                                                                                     
 659                      );                                                                                            
 660                                                                                                                    
 661              queueWrite(new JsonPutRequest(forecastResponseObject, this));                                         
 662                                                                                                                    
 663          } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                               
 664              logger.error("JSON exception: ", e);                                                                  
 665          }                                                                                                         
 666      }

 697      public byte[] getSecretKey() {                                                                                
 698          byte[] authKeyBytes = new byte[16];                                                                       
 699                                                                                                                    
 700          SharedPreferences sharedPrefs = GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(getDeviceSupport().getDevice().🔵
 701                                                                                                                    
 702          String authKey = sharedPrefs.getString("authkey", null);                                                  
 703          if (authKey != null && !authKey.isEmpty()) {                                                              
 704              byte[] srcBytes = authKey.trim().getBytes();                                                          
 705              if (authKey.length() == 34 && authKey.startsWith("0x")) {                                             
 706                  srcBytes = GB.hexStringToByteArray(authKey.substring(2));                                         
 707              }                                                                                                     
 708              System.arraycopy(srcBytes, 0, authKeyBytes, 0, Math.min(srcBytes.length, 16));                        
 709          }                                                                                                         
 710                                                                                                                    
 711          return authKeyBytes;                                                                                      
 712      }

 730      @Override                                                                                                     
 731      public void overwriteButtons(String jsonConfigString) {

 733              JSONArray jsonArray = new JSONArray(                                                                  
 734                      GBApplication.getPrefs().getString(HRConfigActivity.CONFIG_KEY_Q_ACTIONS, "[]")               
 735              );                                                                                                    
 736              String[] menuItems = new String[jsonArray.length()];                                                  
 737              for (int i = 0; i < jsonArray.length(); i++) menuItems[i] = jsonArray.getString(i);                   
 738                                                                                                                    
 739              SharedPreferences prefs = getDeviceSpecificPreferences();                                             
 740              String upperButtonApp = prefs.getString(DeviceSettingsPreferenceConst.PREF_BUTTON_1_FUNCTION, "weather🔵
 741              String middleButtonApp = prefs.getString(DeviceSettingsPreferenceConst.PREF_BUTTON_2_FUNCTION, "commut🔵
 742              String lowerButtonApp = prefs.getString(DeviceSettingsPreferenceConst.PREF_BUTTON_3_FUNCTION, "musicAp🔵
 743                                                                                                                    
 744              queueWrite(new ButtonConfigurationPutRequest(                                                         
 745                      menuItems,                                                                                    
 746                      upperButtonApp,                                                                               
 747                      middleButtonApp,                                                                              
 748                      lowerButtonApp,                                                                               
 749                      this                                                                                          
 750              ));                                                                                                   
 751          } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                               
 752              e.printStackTrace();                                                                                  
 753          }

 757      public void onSendConfiguration(String config) {                                                              
 758          switch (config) {

 760              case DeviceSettingsPreferenceConst.PREF_BUTTON_2_FUNCTION:                                            
 761              case DeviceSettingsPreferenceConst.PREF_BUTTON_3_FUNCTION:                                            
 762                  overwriteButtons(null);                                                                           
 763                  break;
