 769      @Override                                                                                                     
 770      public void handleHeartRateCharacteristic(BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic) {                       
 771          super.handleHeartRateCharacteristic(characteristic);                                                      
 772                                                                                                                    
 773          byte[] value = characteristic.getValue();                                                                 
 774                                                                                                                    
 775          int heartRate = value[1];                                                                                 
 776                                                                                                                    
 777          logger.debug("heart rate: " + heartRate);                                                                 
 778      }                                                                                                             
 779                                                                                                                    
 780      @Override                                                                                                     
 781      protected void handleBackgroundCharacteristic(BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic) {                   
 782          super.handleBackgroundCharacteristic(characteristic);                                                     
 783                                                                                                                    
 784          byte[] value = characteristic.getValue();                                                                 
 785                                                                                                                    
 786          byte requestType = value[1];                                                                              
 787                                                                                                                    
 788          if(requestType == (byte) 0x04){                                                                           
 789              handleCallRequest(value);                                                                             
 790          }else if (requestType == (byte) 0x05) {                                                                   
 791              handleMusicRequest(value);                                                                            
 792          } else if (requestType == (byte) 0x01) {                                                                  
 793              int eventId = value[2];                                                                               
 794              logger.info("got event id " + eventId);                                                               
 795              try {                                                                                                 
 796                  String jsonString = new String(value, 3, value.length - 3);                                       
 797                  logger.info(jsonString);                                                                          
 798                  JSONObject requestJson = new JSONObject(jsonString);                                              
 799                                                                                                                    
 800                  JSONObject request = requestJson.getJSONObject("req");                                            
 801                  int requestId = request.getInt("id");                                                             
 802                                                                                                                    
 803                  if (request.has("ringMyPhone")) {                                                                 
 804                      String action = request.getJSONObject("ringMyPhone").getString("action");                     
 805                      logger.info("got ringMyPhone request; " + action);                                            
 806                      GBDeviceEventFindPhone findPhoneEvent = new GBDeviceEventFindPhone();                         
 807                                                                                                                    
 808                      JSONObject responseObject = new JSONObject()                                                  
 809                              .put("res", new JSONObject()                                                          
 810                                      .put("id", requestId)                                                         
 811                                      .put("set", new JSONObject()                                                  
 812                                              .put("ringMyPhone", new JSONObject()                                  
 813                                              )                                                                     
 814                                      )                                                                             
 815                              );                                                                                    
 816                                                                                                                    
 817                      if ("on".equals(action)) {                                                                    
 818                          findPhoneEvent.event = GBDeviceEventFindPhone.Event.START;                                
 819                          getDeviceSupport().evaluateGBDeviceEvent(findPhoneEvent);                                 
 820                          responseObject                                                                            
 821                                  .getJSONObject("res")                                                             
 822                                  .getJSONObject("set")                                                             
 823                                  .getJSONObject("ringMyPhone")                                                     
 824                                  .put("result", "on");                                                             
 825                          queueWrite(new JsonPutRequest(responseObject, this));                                     
 826                      } else if ("off".equals(action)) {                                                            
 827                          findPhoneEvent.event = GBDeviceEventFindPhone.Event.STOP;                                 
 828                          getDeviceSupport().evaluateGBDeviceEvent(findPhoneEvent);                                 
 829                          responseObject                                                                            
 830                                  .getJSONObject("res")                                                             
 831                                  .getJSONObject("set")                                                             
 832                                  .getJSONObject("ringMyPhone")                                                     
 833                                  .put("result", "off");                                                            
 834                          queueWrite(new JsonPutRequest(responseObject, this));                                     
 835                      }                                                                                             
 836                  } else if (request.has("weatherInfo") || request.has("weatherApp._.config.locations")) {          
 837                      logger.info("Got weatherInfo request");                                                       
 838                      WeatherSpec weatherSpec = Weather.getInstance().getWeatherSpec();                             
 839                      if (weatherSpec != null) {                                                                    
 840                          onSendWeather(weatherSpec);                                                               
 841                      } else {                                                                                      
 842                          logger.info("no weather data available  - ignoring request");                             
 843                      }                                                                                             
 844                  } else if (request.has("commuteApp._.config.commute_info")) {                                     
 845                      String action = request.getJSONObject("commuteApp._.config.commute_info")                     
 846                              .getString("dest");                                                                   
 847                                                                                                                    
 848                      String startStop = request.getJSONObject("commuteApp._.config.commute_info")                  
 849                              .getString("action");                                                                 
 850                                                                                                                    
 851                      if (startStop.equals("stop")) {                                                               
 852                          // overwriteButtons(null);                                                                
 853                          return;                                                                                   
 854                      }                                                                                             
 855                                                                                                                    
 856                      queueWrite(new SetCommuteMenuMessage("Anfrage wird weitergeleitet...", false, this));         
 857                                                                                                                    
 858                      Intent menuIntent = new Intent(QHybridSupport.QHYBRID_EVENT_COMMUTE_MENU);                    
 859                      menuIntent.putExtra("EXTRA_ACTION", action);                                                  
 860                      getContext().sendBroadcast(menuIntent);                                                       
 861                  } else {                                                                                          
 862                      logger.warn("Unhandled request from watch: " + requestJson.toString());                       
 863                  }                                                                                                 
 864              } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                           
 865                  e.printStackTrace();                                                                              
 866              }                                                                                                     
 867          }                                                                                                         
 868      }                                                                                                             
 869                                                                                                                    
 870      private void handleCallRequest(byte[] value) {                                                                
 871          boolean acceptCall = value[7] == (byte) 0x00;                                                             
 872          queueWrite(new PlayCallNotificationRequest("", false, this));                                             
 873                                                                                                                    
 874          GBDeviceEventCallControl callControlEvent = new GBDeviceEventCallControl();                               
 875          callControlEvent.event = acceptCall ? GBDeviceEventCallControl.Event.START : GBDeviceEventCallControl.Even🔵
 876                                                                                                                    
 877          getDeviceSupport().evaluateGBDeviceEvent(callControlEvent);                                               
 878      }                                                                                                             
 879                                                                                                                    
 880      private void handleMusicRequest(byte[] value) {                                                               
 881          byte command = value[3];                                                                                  
 882          logger.info("got music command: " + command);                                                             
 883          MUSIC_WATCH_REQUEST request = MUSIC_WATCH_REQUEST.fromCommandByte(command);                               
 884                                                                                                                    
 885          GBDeviceEventMusicControl deviceEventMusicControl = new GBDeviceEventMusicControl();                      
 886          deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.PLAY;                                     
 887                                                                                                                    
 888          // TODO add skipping/seeking                                                                              
 889                                                                                                                    
 890          switch (request) {                                                                                        
 891              case MUSIC_REQUEST_PLAY_PAUSE: {                                                                      
 892                  queueWrite(new MusicControlRequest(MUSIC_PHONE_REQUEST.MUSIC_REQUEST_PLAY_PAUSE));                
 893                  deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.PLAYPAUSE;                        
 894                  break;                                                                                            
 895              }                                                                                                     
 896              case MUSIC_REQUEST_NEXT: {                                                                            
 897                  queueWrite(new MusicControlRequest(MUSIC_PHONE_REQUEST.MUSIC_REQUEST_NEXT));                      
 898                  deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.NEXT;                             
 899                  break;                                                                                            
 900              }                                                                                                     
 901              case MUSIC_REQUEST_PREVIOUS: {                                                                        
 902                  queueWrite(new MusicControlRequest(MUSIC_PHONE_REQUEST.MUSIC_REQUEST_PREVIOUS));                  
 903                  deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.PREVIOUS;                         
 904                  break;                                                                                            
 905              }                                                                                                     
 906              case MUSIC_REQUEST_LOUDER: {                                                                          
 907                  queueWrite(new MusicControlRequest(MUSIC_PHONE_REQUEST.MUSIC_REQUEST_LOUDER));                    
 908                  deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.VOLUMEUP;                         
 909                  break;                                                                                            
 910              }                                                                                                     
 911              case MUSIC_REQUEST_QUITER: {                                                                          
 912                  queueWrite(new MusicControlRequest(MUSIC_PHONE_REQUEST.MUSIC_REQUEST_QUITER));                    
 913                  deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.VOLUMEDOWN;                       
 914                  break;                                                                                            
 915              }                                                                                                     
 916          }                                                                                                         
 917                                                                                                                    
 918          getDeviceSupport().evaluateGBDeviceEvent(deviceEventMusicControl);                                        
 919      }                                                                                                             
 920                                                                                                                    
 921      @Override                                                                                                     
 922      public void setCommuteMenuMessage(String message, boolean finished) {                                         
 923          queueWrite(new SetCommuteMenuMessage(message, finished, this));                                           
 924      }

 928      }

  95      @Override                                                                                                     
  96      public void initialize() {                                                                                    
  97          if (Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= Build.VERSION_CODES.LOLLIPOP) {                                              
  98              queueWrite(new RequestMtuRequest(512));                                                               
  99          }                                                                                                         
 100                                                                                                                    
 101          queueWrite(new SetDeviceStateRequest(GBDevice.State.AUTHENTICATING));                                     
 102                                                                                                                    
 103          negotiateSymmetricKey();                                                                                  
 104                                                                                                                    
 105          queueWrite(new SetDeviceStateRequest(GBDevice.State.INITIALIZING));                                       
 106                                                                                                                    
 107          loadNotificationConfigurations();                                                                         
 108          queueWrite(new NotificationFilterPutHRRequest(this.notificationConfigurations, this));                    
 109          setVibrationStrength();                                                                                   
 110                                                                                                                    
 111          syncSettings();                                                                                           
 112                                                                                                                    
 113          setTime();                                                                                                
 114                                                                                                                    
 115          overwriteButtons(null);

 121          // dunno if there is any point in doing this at start since when no watch is connected the QHybridSupport 🔵
 122                                                                                                                    
 123          queueWrite(new SetDeviceStateRequest(GBDevice.State.INITIALIZED));                                        
 124      }

 126      private void setVibrationStrength() {                                                                         
 127          Prefs prefs = new Prefs(getDeviceSpecificPreferences());                                                  
 128          int vibrationStrengh = prefs.getInt(DeviceSettingsPreferenceConst.PREF_VIBRATION_STRENGH_PERCENTAGE, 2);  
 129          if (vibrationStrengh > 0) {                                                                               
 130              vibrationStrengh = (vibrationStrengh + 1) * 25; // Seems 0,50,75,100 are working...                   
 131          }                                                                                                         
 132          setVibrationStrength((short) (vibrationStrengh));                                                         
 133      }

 163      private void loadWidgets() {                                                                                  
 164          Prefs prefs = new Prefs(GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(getDeviceSupport().getDevice().getAddre🔵
 165          boolean forceWhiteBackground = prefs.getBoolean("force_white_color_scheme", false);                       
 166          String fontColor = forceWhiteBackground ? "black" : "default";                                            
 167                                                                                                                    
 168          this.widgets.clear();                                                                                     
 169          String widgetJson = GBApplication.getPrefs().getPreferences().getString("FOSSIL_HR_WIDGETS", "{}");       
 170          String customWidgetJson = GBApplication.getPrefs().getString("QHYBRID_CUSTOM_WIDGETS", "[]");             
 171                                                                                                                    
 172          try {                                                                                                     
 173              JSONObject widgetConfig = new JSONObject(widgetJson);                                                 
 174              JSONArray customWidgets = new JSONArray(customWidgetJson);                                            
 175                                                                                                                    
 176              Iterator<String> keyIterator = widgetConfig.keys();                                                   
 177              HashMap<String, Integer> positionMap = new HashMap<>(4);                                              
 178              positionMap.put("top", 0);                                                                            
 179              positionMap.put("right", 90);                                                                         
 180              positionMap.put("bottom", 180);                                                                       
 181              positionMap.put("left", 270);                                                                         
 182                                                                                                                    
 183              while(keyIterator.hasNext()){                                                                         
 184                  String position = keyIterator.next();                                                             
 185                  String identifier = widgetConfig.getString(position);                                             
 186                  Widget.WidgetType type = Widget.WidgetType.fromJsonIdentifier(identifier);                        
 187                                                                                                                    
 188                  Widget widget = null;                                                                             
 189                  if(type != null) {                                                                                
 190                      widget = new Widget(type, positionMap.get(position), 63, fontColor);                          
 191                  }else{                                                                                            
 192                      identifier = identifier.substring(7);                                                         
 193                      for(int i = 0; i < customWidgets.length(); i++){                                              
 194                          JSONObject customWidget = customWidgets.getJSONObject(i);                                 
 195                          if(customWidget.getString("name").equals(identifier)){                                    
 196                              boolean drawCircle = false;                                                           
 197                              if(customWidget.has("drawCircle")) drawCircle = customWidget.getBoolean("drawCircle");
 198                              CustomWidget newWidget = new CustomWidget(                                            
 199                                      customWidget.getString("name"),                                               
 200                                      positionMap.get(position),                                                    
 201                                      63,                                                                           
 202 -                                    fontColor,                                                                    
 203 -                                    drawCircle                                                                    
 204 +                                    fontColor                                                                     
 205                              );                                                                                    
 206                              JSONArray elements = customWidget.getJSONArray("elements");                           
 207                                                                                                                    
 208                              for (int i2 = 0; i2 < elements.length(); i2++) {                                      
 209                                  JSONObject element = elements.getJSONObject(i2);                                  
 210                                  if (element.getString("type").equals("text")) {                                   
 211                                      newWidget.addElement(new CustomTextWidgetElement(                             
 212                                              element.getString("id"),                                              
 213                                              element.getString("value"),                                           
 214                                              element.getInt("x"),                                                  
 215                                              element.getInt("y")                                                   
 216                                      ));                                                                           
 217                                  } else if (element.getString("type").equals("background")) {                      
 218                                      newWidget.addElement(new CustomBackgroundWidgetElement(                       
 219                                              element.getString("id"),                                              
 220                                              element.getString("value")                                            
 221                                      ));                                                                           
 222                                  }                                                                                 
 223                              }                                                                                     
 224                              widget = newWidget;                                                                   
 225                          }                                                                                         
 226                      }                                                                                             
 227                  }                                                                                                 
 228                                                                                                                    
 229                  if(widget == null) continue;                                                                      
 230                  this.widgets.add(widget);                                                                         
 231              }                                                                                                     
 232          } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                               
 233              e.printStackTrace();                                                                                  
 234          }                                                                                                         
 235                                                                                                                    
 236          uploadWidgets();                                                                                          
 237      }

 239      private void uploadWidgets(){                                                                                 
 240          negotiateSymmetricKey();                                                                                  
 241          ArrayList<Widget> systemWidgets = new ArrayList<>(widgets.size());                                        
 242          for(Widget widget : this.widgets){                                                                        
 243              if(!(widget instanceof CustomWidget)) systemWidgets.add(widget);                                      
 244          }                                                                                                         
 245          queueWrite(new WidgetsPutRequest(systemWidgets.toArray(new Widget[0]), this));                            
 246      }

 384      @Override                                                                                                     
 385      public void setWidgetContent(String widgetID, String content, boolean renderOnWatch) {                        
 386          boolean update = false;                                                                                   
 387          for (Widget widget : this.widgets) {                                                                      
 388              if(!(widget instanceof CustomWidget)) continue;                                                       
 389              if(((CustomWidget) widget).updateElementValue(widgetID, content)) update = true;                      
 390          }                                                                                                         
 391                                                                                                                    
 392          if (renderOnWatch && update) renderWidgets();                                                             
 393      }

 395      private void negotiateSymmetricKey() {                                                                        
 396          queueWrite(new VerifyPrivateKeyRequest(                                                                   
 397                  this.getSecretKey(),                                                                              
 398                  this                                                                                              
 399          ));                                                                                                       
 400      }

 402      @Override                                                                                                     
 403      public void setTime() {                                                                                       
 404          negotiateSymmetricKey();                                                                                  
 405                                                                                                                    
 406          long millis = System.currentTimeMillis();                                                                 
 407          TimeZone zone = new GregorianCalendar().getTimeZone();                                                    
 408                                                                                                                    
 409          queueWrite(                                                                                               
 410                  new ConfigurationPutRequest(                                                                      
 411                          new TimeConfigItem(                                                                       
 412                                  (int) (millis / 1000 + getDeviceSupport().getTimeOffset() * 60),                  
 413                                  (short) (millis % 1000),                                                          
 414                                  (short) (zone.getOffset(millis) / 60000)                                          
 415                          ),                                                                                        
 416                          this), false                                                                              
 417          );                                                                                                        
 418      }

 420      @Override                                                                                                     
 421      public void setMusicInfo(MusicSpec musicSpec) {                                                               
 422          if (                                                                                                      
 423                  currentSpec != null                                                                               
 424                          && currentSpec.album.equals(musicSpec.album)                                              
 425                          && currentSpec.artist.equals(musicSpec.artist)                                            
 426                          && currentSpec.track.equals(musicSpec.track)                                              
 427          ) return;                                                                                                 
 428          currentSpec = musicSpec;                                                                                  
 429          try {                                                                                                     
 430              queueWrite(new MusicInfoSetRequest(                                                                   
 431                      musicSpec.artist,                                                                             
 432                      musicSpec.album,                                                                              
 433                      musicSpec.track,                                                                              
 434                      this                                                                                          
 435              ));                                                                                                   
 436          }catch (BufferOverflowException e){                                                                       
 437              GB.log("musicInfo: " + musicSpec, GB.ERROR, e);                                                       
 438          }                                                                                                         
 439      }

 472      public boolean playRawNotification(NotificationSpec notificationSpec) {                                       
 473          String senderOrTitle = StringUtils.getFirstOf(notificationSpec.sender, notificationSpec.title);           
 474                                                                                                                    
 475          try {                                                                                                     
 476              for (NotificationHRConfiguration configuration : this.notificationConfigurations){                    
 477                  if(configuration.getPackageName().equals(notificationSpec.sourceAppId)){                          
 478                      queueWrite(new PlayTextNotificationRequest(notificationSpec.sourceAppId, senderOrTitle, notifi🔵
 479                      return true;                                                                                  
 480                  }                                                                                                 
 481              }                                                                                                     
 482              queueWrite(new PlayTextNotificationRequest("generic", senderOrTitle, notificationSpec.body, this));   
 483          }catch (Exception e){                                                                                     
 484              e.printStackTrace();                                                                                  
 485          }                                                                                                         
 486          return true;                                                                                              
 487      }

 514      // this method is based on the one from AppMessageHandlerYWeather.java                                        
 515      private int getIconForConditionCode(int conditionCode, boolean isNight) {                                     
 516          final int CLEAR_DAY = 0;                                                                                  
 517          final int CLEAR_NIGHT = 1;                                                                                
 518          final int CLOUDY = 2;                                                                                     
 519          final int PARTLY_CLOUDY_DAY = 3;                                                                          
 520          final int PARTLY_CLOUDY_NIGHT = 4;                                                                        
 521          final int RAIN = 5;                                                                                       
 522          final int SNOW = 6;                                                                                       
 523          final int SNOW_2 = 7; // same as 6?                                                                       
 524          final int THUNDERSTORM = 8;                                                                               
 525          final int CLOUDY_2 = 9; // same as 2?                                                                     
 526          final int WINDY = 10;                                                                                     
 527                                                                                                                    
 528          if (conditionCode == 800 || conditionCode == 951) {                                                       
 529              return isNight ? CLEAR_NIGHT : CLEAR_DAY;                                                             
 530          } else if (conditionCode > 800 && conditionCode < 900) {                                                  
 531              return isNight ? PARTLY_CLOUDY_NIGHT : PARTLY_CLOUDY_DAY;                                             
 532          } else if (conditionCode >= 300 && conditionCode < 400) {                                                 
 533              return RAIN; // drizzle mapped to rain                                                                
 534          } else if (conditionCode >= 500 && conditionCode < 600) {                                                 
 535              return RAIN;                                                                                          
 536          } else if (conditionCode >= 700 && conditionCode < 732) {                                                 
 537              return CLOUDY;                                                                                        
 538          } else if (conditionCode == 741 || conditionCode == 751 || conditionCode == 761 || conditionCode == 762) {
 539              return CLOUDY; // fog mapped to cloudy                                                                
 540          } else if (conditionCode == 771) {                                                                        
 541              return CLOUDY; // squalls mapped to cloudy                                                            
 542          } else if (conditionCode == 781) {                                                                        
 543              return WINDY; // tornato mapped to windy                                                              
 544          } else if (conditionCode >= 200 && conditionCode < 300) {                                                 
 545              return THUNDERSTORM;                                                                                  
 546          } else if (conditionCode >= 600 && conditionCode <= 602) {                                                
 547              return SNOW;                                                                                          
 548          } else if (conditionCode >= 611 && conditionCode <= 622) {                                                
 549              return RAIN;                                                                                          
 550          } else if (conditionCode == 906) {                                                                        
 551              return RAIN; // hail mapped to rain                                                                   
 552          } else if (conditionCode >= 907 && conditionCode < 957) {                                                 
 553              return WINDY;                                                                                         
 554          } else if (conditionCode == 905) {                                                                        
 555              return WINDY;                                                                                         
 556          } else if (conditionCode == 900) {                                                                        
 557              return WINDY;                                                                                         
 558          } else if (conditionCode == 901 || conditionCode == 902 || conditionCode == 962) {                        
 559              return WINDY;                                                                                         
 560          }                                                                                                         
 561          return isNight ? CLEAR_NIGHT : CLEAR_DAY;                                                                 
 562      }                                                                                                             
 563                                                                                                                    
 564      @Override                                                                                                     
 565      public void onSendWeather(WeatherSpec weatherSpec) {                                                          
 566          long ts = System.currentTimeMillis();                                                                     
 567          ts /= 1000;                                                                                               
 568          try {                                                                                                     
 569              JSONObject responseObject = new JSONObject()                                                          
 570                      .put("res", new JSONObject()                                                                  
 571                              .put("id", 0) // seems the id does not matter?                                        
 572                              .put("set", new JSONObject()                                                          
 573                                      .put("weatherInfo", new JSONObject()                                          
 574                                              .put("alive", ts + 60 * 60)                                           
 575                                              .put("unit", "c") // FIXME: do not hardcode                           
 576                                              .put("temp", weatherSpec.currentTemp - 273)                           
 577                                              .put("cond_id", getIconForConditionCode(weatherSpec.currentConditionCo🔵
 578                                      )                                                                             
 579                              )                                                                                     
 580                      );                                                                                            
 581                                                                                                                    
 582              queueWrite(new JsonPutRequest(responseObject, this));                                                 
 583                                                                                                                    
 584              JSONArray forecastWeekArray = new JSONArray();                                                        
 585              final String[] weekdays = {"", "Sun", "Mon", "Tue", "Wed", "Thu", "Fri", "Sat"};                      
 586              Calendar cal = Calendar.getInstance();                                                                
 587              cal.setTimeInMillis(weatherSpec.timestamp * 1000L);                                                   
 588              int i = 0;                                                                                            
 589              for (WeatherSpec.Forecast forecast : weatherSpec.forecasts) {                                         
 590                  cal.add(Calendar.DATE, 1);                                                                        
 591                  int dayOfWeek = cal.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_WEEK);                                                    
 592                  forecastWeekArray.put(new JSONObject()                                                            
 593                          .put("day", weekdays[dayOfWeek])                                                          
 594                          .put("cond_id", getIconForConditionCode(forecast.conditionCode, false)) // FIXME do not as🔵
 595                          .put("high", forecast.maxTemp - 273)                                                      
 596                          .put("low", forecast.minTemp - 273)                                                       
 597                  );                                                                                                
 598                  if (++i == 3) break; // max 3                                                                     
 599              }                                                                                                     
 600                                                                                                                    
 601              JSONArray forecastDayArray = new JSONArray();                                                         
 602              final int[] hours = {0, 0, 0};                                                                        
 603                                                                                                                    
 604              for (int hour : hours) {                                                                              
 605                  forecastDayArray.put(new JSONObject()                                                             
 606                          .put("hour", hour)                                                                        
 607                          .put("cond_id", 0)                                                                        
 608                          .put("temp", 0)                                                                           
 609                  );                                                                                                
 610              }                                                                                                     
 611                                                                                                                    
 612                                                                                                                    
 613              JSONObject forecastResponseObject = new JSONObject()                                                  
 614                      .put("res", new JSONObject()                                                                  
 615                              .put("id", 0)                                                                         
 616                              .put("set", new JSONObject()                                                          
 617                                      .put("weatherApp._.config.locations", new JSONArray()                         
 618                                              .put(new JSONObject()                                                 
 619                                                      .put("alive", ts + 60 * 60)                                   
 620                                                      .put("city", weatherSpec.location)                            
 621                                                      .put("unit", "c") // FIXME: do not hardcode                   
 622                                                      .put("temp", weatherSpec.currentTemp - 273)                   
 623                                                      .put("high", weatherSpec.todayMaxTemp - 273)                  
 624                                                      .put("low", weatherSpec.todayMinTemp - 273)                   
 625                                                      .put("rain", 0)                                               
 626                                                      .put("cond_id", getIconForConditionCode(weatherSpec.currentCon🔵
 627                                                      .put("forecast_day", forecastDayArray)                        
 628                                                      .put("forecast_week", forecastWeekArray)                      
 629                                              )                                                                     
 630                                      )                                                                             
 631                              )                                                                                     
 632                      );                                                                                            
 633                                                                                                                    
 634              queueWrite(new JsonPutRequest(forecastResponseObject, this));                                         
 635                                                                                                                    
 636          } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                               
 637              logger.error("JSON exception: ", e);                                                                  
 638          }                                                                                                         
 639      }

 670      public byte[] getSecretKey() {                                                                                
 671          byte[] authKeyBytes = new byte[16];                                                                       
 672                                                                                                                    
 673          SharedPreferences sharedPrefs = GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(getDeviceSupport().getDevice().🔵
 674                                                                                                                    
 675          String authKey = sharedPrefs.getString("authkey", null);                                                  
 676          if (authKey != null && !authKey.isEmpty()) {                                                              
 677              byte[] srcBytes = authKey.trim().getBytes();                                                          
 678              if (authKey.length() == 34 && authKey.startsWith("0x")) {                                             
 679                  srcBytes = GB.hexStringToByteArray(authKey.substring(2));                                         
 680              }                                                                                                     
 681              System.arraycopy(srcBytes, 0, authKeyBytes, 0, Math.min(srcBytes.length, 16));                        
 682          }                                                                                                         
 683                                                                                                                    
 684          return authKeyBytes;                                                                                      
 685      }

 703      @Override                                                                                                     
 704      public void overwriteButtons(String jsonConfigString) {                                                       
 705          try {                                                                                                     
 706              JSONArray jsonArray = new JSONArray(                                                                  
 707                      GBApplication.getPrefs().getString(HRConfigActivity.CONFIG_KEY_Q_ACTIONS, "[]")               
 708              );                                                                                                    
 709              String[] menuItems = new String[jsonArray.length()];                                                  
 710              for (int i = 0; i < jsonArray.length(); i++) menuItems[i] = jsonArray.getString(i);                   
 711                                                                                                                    
 712              SharedPreferences prefs = getDeviceSpecificPreferences();                                             
 713              String upperButtonApp = prefs.getString(DeviceSettingsPreferenceConst.PREF_BUTTON_1_FUNCTION, "weather🔵
 714              String middleButtonApp = prefs.getString(DeviceSettingsPreferenceConst.PREF_BUTTON_2_FUNCTION, "commut🔵
 715              String lowerButtonApp = prefs.getString(DeviceSettingsPreferenceConst.PREF_BUTTON_3_FUNCTION, "musicAp🔵
 716                                                                                                                    
 717              queueWrite(new ButtonConfigurationPutRequest(                                                         
 718                      menuItems,                                                                                    
 719                      upperButtonApp,                                                                               
 720                      middleButtonApp,                                                                              
 721                      lowerButtonApp,                                                                               
 722                      this                                                                                          
 723              ));                                                                                                   
 724          } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                               
 725              e.printStackTrace();                                                                                  
 726          }                                                                                                         
 727      }

 729      @Override                                                                                                     
 730      public void onSendConfiguration(String config) {                                                              
 731          switch (config) {                                                                                         
 732              case DeviceSettingsPreferenceConst.PREF_BUTTON_1_FUNCTION:                                            
 733              case DeviceSettingsPreferenceConst.PREF_BUTTON_2_FUNCTION:                                            
 734              case DeviceSettingsPreferenceConst.PREF_BUTTON_3_FUNCTION:                                            
 735                  overwriteButtons(null);                                                                           
 736                  break;                                                                                            
 737              case DeviceSettingsPreferenceConst.PREF_VIBRATION_STRENGH_PERCENTAGE:                                 
 738                  setVibrationStrength();                                                                           
 739          }                                                                                                         
 740      }
