 742      @Override                                                                                                     
 743      public void handleHeartRateCharacteristic(BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic) {                       
 744          super.handleHeartRateCharacteristic(characteristic);                                                      
 745                                                                                                                    
 746          byte[] value = characteristic.getValue();                                                                 
 747                                                                                                                    
 748          int heartRate = value[1];                                                                                 
 749                                                                                                                    
 750          logger.debug("heart rate: " + heartRate);                                                                 
 751      }                                                                                                             
 752                                                                                                                    
 753      @Override                                                                                                     
 754      protected void handleBackgroundCharacteristic(BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic) {                   
 755          super.handleBackgroundCharacteristic(characteristic);                                                     
 756                                                                                                                    
 757          byte[] value = characteristic.getValue();                                                                 
 758                                                                                                                    
 759          byte requestType = value[1];                                                                              
 760                                                                                                                    
 761          if(requestType == (byte) 0x04){                                                                           
 762              handleCallRequest(value);                                                                             
 763          }else if (requestType == (byte) 0x05) {                                                                   
 764              handleMusicRequest(value);                                                                            
 765          } else if (requestType == (byte) 0x01) {                                                                  
 766              int eventId = value[2];                                                                               
 767              logger.info("got event id " + eventId);                                                               
 768              try {                                                                                                 
 769                  String jsonString = new String(value, 3, value.length - 3);                                       
 770                  logger.info(jsonString);                                                                          
 771                  JSONObject requestJson = new JSONObject(jsonString);                                              
 772                                                                                                                    
 773                  JSONObject request = requestJson.getJSONObject("req");                                            
 774                  int requestId = request.getInt("id");                                                             
 775                                                                                                                    
 776                  if (request.has("ringMyPhone")) {                                                                 
 777                      String action = request.getJSONObject("ringMyPhone").getString("action");                     
 778                      logger.info("got ringMyPhone request; " + action);                                            
 779                      GBDeviceEventFindPhone findPhoneEvent = new GBDeviceEventFindPhone();                         
 780                                                                                                                    
 781                      JSONObject responseObject = new JSONObject()                                                  
 782                              .put("res", new JSONObject()                                                          
 783                                      .put("id", requestId)                                                         
 784                                      .put("set", new JSONObject()                                                  
 785                                              .put("ringMyPhone", new JSONObject()                                  
 786                                              )                                                                     
 787                                      )                                                                             
 788                              );                                                                                    
 789                                                                                                                    
 790                      if ("on".equals(action)) {                                                                    
 791                          findPhoneEvent.event = GBDeviceEventFindPhone.Event.START;                                
 792                          getDeviceSupport().evaluateGBDeviceEvent(findPhoneEvent);                                 
 793                          responseObject                                                                            
 794                                  .getJSONObject("res")                                                             
 795                                  .getJSONObject("set")                                                             
 796                                  .getJSONObject("ringMyPhone")                                                     
 797                                  .put("result", "on");                                                             
 798                          queueWrite(new JsonPutRequest(responseObject, this));                                     
 799                      } else if ("off".equals(action)) {                                                            
 800                          findPhoneEvent.event = GBDeviceEventFindPhone.Event.STOP;                                 
 801                          getDeviceSupport().evaluateGBDeviceEvent(findPhoneEvent);                                 
 802                          responseObject                                                                            
 803                                  .getJSONObject("res")                                                             
 804                                  .getJSONObject("set")                                                             
 805                                  .getJSONObject("ringMyPhone")                                                     
 806                                  .put("result", "off");                                                            
 807                          queueWrite(new JsonPutRequest(responseObject, this));                                     
 808                      }                                                                                             
 809                  } else if (request.has("weatherInfo") || request.has("weatherApp._.config.locations")) {          
 810                      logger.info("Got weatherInfo request");                                                       
 811                      WeatherSpec weatherSpec = Weather.getInstance().getWeatherSpec();                             
 812                      if (weatherSpec != null) {                                                                    
 813                          onSendWeather(weatherSpec);                                                               
 814                      } else {                                                                                      
 815                          logger.info("no weather data available  - ignoring request");                             
 816                      }                                                                                             
 817                  } else if (request.has("commuteApp._.config.commute_info")) {                                     
 818                      String action = request.getJSONObject("commuteApp._.config.commute_info")                     
 819                              .getString("dest");                                                                   
 820                                                                                                                    
 821                      String startStop = request.getJSONObject("commuteApp._.config.commute_info")                  
 822                              .getString("action");                                                                 
 823                                                                                                                    
 824                      if (startStop.equals("stop")) {                                                               
 825                          // overwriteButtons(null);                                                                
 826                          return;                                                                                   
 827                      }                                                                                             
 828                                                                                                                    
 829                      queueWrite(new SetCommuteMenuMessage("Anfrage wird weitergeleitet...", false, this));         
 830                                                                                                                    
 831                      Intent menuIntent = new Intent(QHybridSupport.QHYBRID_EVENT_COMMUTE_MENU);                    
 832                      menuIntent.putExtra("EXTRA_ACTION", action);                                                  
 833                      getContext().sendBroadcast(menuIntent);                                                       
 834                  } else {                                                                                          
 835                      logger.warn("Unhandled request from watch: " + requestJson.toString());                       
 836                  }                                                                                                 
 837              } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                           
 838                  e.printStackTrace();                                                                              
 839              }                                                                                                     
 840          }                                                                                                         
 841      }                                                                                                             
 842                                                                                                                    
 843      private void handleCallRequest(byte[] value) {                                                                
 844          boolean acceptCall = value[7] == (byte) 0x00;                                                             
 845          queueWrite(new PlayCallNotificationRequest("", false, this));                                             
 846                                                                                                                    
 847          GBDeviceEventCallControl callControlEvent = new GBDeviceEventCallControl();                               
 848          callControlEvent.event = acceptCall ? GBDeviceEventCallControl.Event.START : GBDeviceEventCallControl.Even🔵
 849                                                                                                                    
 850          getDeviceSupport().evaluateGBDeviceEvent(callControlEvent);                                               
 851      }                                                                                                             
 852                                                                                                                    
 853      private void handleMusicRequest(byte[] value) {                                                               
 854          byte command = value[3];                                                                                  
 855          logger.info("got music command: " + command);                                                             
 856          MUSIC_WATCH_REQUEST request = MUSIC_WATCH_REQUEST.fromCommandByte(command);                               
 857                                                                                                                    
 858          GBDeviceEventMusicControl deviceEventMusicControl = new GBDeviceEventMusicControl();                      
 859          deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.PLAY;                                     
 860                                                                                                                    
 861          // TODO add skipping/seeking                                                                              
 862                                                                                                                    
 863          switch (request) {                                                                                        
 864              case MUSIC_REQUEST_PLAY_PAUSE: {                                                                      
 865                  queueWrite(new MusicControlRequest(MUSIC_PHONE_REQUEST.MUSIC_REQUEST_PLAY_PAUSE));                
 866                  deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.PLAYPAUSE;                        
 867                  break;                                                                                            
 868              }                                                                                                     
 869              case MUSIC_REQUEST_NEXT: {                                                                            
 870                  queueWrite(new MusicControlRequest(MUSIC_PHONE_REQUEST.MUSIC_REQUEST_NEXT));                      
 871                  deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.NEXT;                             
 872                  break;                                                                                            
 873              }                                                                                                     
 874              case MUSIC_REQUEST_PREVIOUS: {                                                                        
 875                  queueWrite(new MusicControlRequest(MUSIC_PHONE_REQUEST.MUSIC_REQUEST_PREVIOUS));                  
 876                  deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.PREVIOUS;                         
 877                  break;                                                                                            
 878              }                                                                                                     
 879              case MUSIC_REQUEST_LOUDER: {                                                                          
 880                  queueWrite(new MusicControlRequest(MUSIC_PHONE_REQUEST.MUSIC_REQUEST_LOUDER));                    
 881                  deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.VOLUMEUP;                         
 882                  break;                                                                                            
 883              }                                                                                                     
 884              case MUSIC_REQUEST_QUITER: {                                                                          
 885                  queueWrite(new MusicControlRequest(MUSIC_PHONE_REQUEST.MUSIC_REQUEST_QUITER));                    
 886                  deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.VOLUMEDOWN;                       
 887                  break;                                                                                            
 888              }                                                                                                     
 889          }                                                                                                         
 890                                                                                                                    
 891          getDeviceSupport().evaluateGBDeviceEvent(deviceEventMusicControl);                                        
 892      }
